programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: Americas Now
programme.desc: Americas Now profiles the development, diversity and challenges facing the Americas, particularly Latin America. The strength of the program is its storytelling. Correspondents across the region present insightful, well-researched and engaging narratives. Americas Now is a compelling, authoritative and balanced voice from the region, giving CGTN a competitive edge in the North American media market.

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: The Heat is a daily talk show anchored from Washington, D.C. It focuses on top stories making news globally. The Heat presents tough issues from a comprehensive, balanced and international and Chinese perspective. Guests from on the spot and around the world ensure lively debate and a range of voices. Wherever the story is happening, The Heat is there.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China’s perspective, policies and stories. The program, relying on global reporting resources, presents in-depth analysis and coverage of major global issues, from a Chinese perspective on international affairs. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

programme.title: Big Story
programme.desc: Big Story is a documentary film program on CGTN. It explores global events with in a variety of filmic styles and featuring original, in-depth, thought-provoking storytelling. The program provides a unique platform for the best current affairs documentaries from around the globe. Big Story aims to present the contemporary world and China’s global perspectives on the contemporary world to an international audience.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA JP Buys vs. Luthando Biko
programme.desc: This episode features a Bantamweight championship bout as current champion JP Buys faces off against interm champion Luthando Biko. Bonus coverage includes Shaun De Lange vs. Marcel Teniers and Wade Kerspuy vs. Josemar Octavio.

programme.title: WCCB Tina Rupprecht vs. Eri Matsuda
programme.desc: Ffrom Heidelberg, Germany, a championship tripleheader takes place headlined by Tina Rupprecht of Germany and Eri Matsuda of Japan competing for the WBC and WBO Women's Atomweight World Championships. Also on the card will be undefeated World Champion Sumire Yamanaka, also of Japan, defending the IBF Atomweight World Title against Fabiana Bytyqi. Rounding out the card will a European Heavyweight Title clash featuring Oleksandr Zakhozhyi against Arnold Gjergjaj.Only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Rabat 2023 - Episode 2
programme.desc: Rabat, Morocco welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. The last edition of Karate 1 Premier League in Rabat saw nearly 200 athletes from 44 countries participating in this event, one of the most prestigious in the world of Karate. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League is back in Rabat, Morocco.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Daniel Ponce De Leon vs. Antonio Escalante
programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features a featherweight battle that ends in a brutal knockout between Daniel Ponce De Leon and Antonio Escalante, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Ricardo Mayorga
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing Ricardo Mayorga in a light middleweight title fight, the first of two bouts between the two, that features an exciting last-minute finish. Also on the card, action from former champs Juan Manuel Marquez and Juan Diaz.

programme.title: Nagoya, Japan: Show 1
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Harumafuji, Kotooshu, Goeido and Kotoshogiku from the Nagoya basho, 2015.

programme.title: Men's Forms Championship
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the CMX Weapons Championship and the Men's Forms Championship at the ISKA US Open Championships held at Disney World, Orlando, FL, USA.

programme.title: Pariah: Sonny Liston
programme.desc: Was Sonny Liston murdered? This four-part documentary series explores the life and untimely death of boxing legend Charles 'Sonny' Liston, who became the heavyweight champion of the world when he knocked out Floyd Patterson in 1962. Unfortunately, just eight years later, he was found dead in his Las Vegas home from an alleged heroin overdose. Suspicion regarding the real cause of his death has continued to this day. Episode 4 of 4.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA JP Buys vs. Luthando Biko

programme.title: WCCB Tina Rupprecht vs. Eri Matsuda
programme.desc: Ffrom Heidelberg, Germany, a championship tripleheader takes place headlined by Tina Rupprecht of Germany and Eri Matsuda of Japan competing for the WBC and WBO Women's Atomweight World Championships. Also on the card will be undefeated World Champion Sumire Yamanaka, also of Japan, defending the IBF Atomweight World Title against Fabiana Bytyqi. Rounding out the card will a European Heavyweight Title clash featuring Oleksandr Zakhozhyi against Arnold Gjergjaj.Only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Daniel Ponce De Leon vs. Antonio Escalante

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Ricardo Mayorga
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing Ricardo Mayorga in a light middleweight title fight, the first of two bouts between the two, that features an exciting last-minute finish. Also on the card, action from former champs Juan Manuel Marquez and Juan Diaz.

programme.title: Nagoya, Japan: Show 1

programme.title: Pariah: Sonny Liston
programme.desc: Was Sonny Liston murdered? This four-part documentary series explores the life and untimely death of boxing legend Charles 'Sonny' Liston, who became the heavyweight champion of the world when he knocked out Floyd Patterson in 1962. Unfortunately, just eight years later, he was found dead in his Las Vegas home from an alleged heroin overdose. Suspicion regarding the real cause of his death has continued to this day. Episode 4 of 4.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Antonio Margarito vs. Paul Williams
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a WBO welterweight championship bout between 8-time defending champ Antonio Margarito, aka 'El Tornado de Tijuana' (34-4, 24 KOs) and undefeated Paul 'The Punisher' Williams (32-0, 24 KOs) from the Home Depot Center in Carson, California, USA, on July 14, 2007.

programme.title: Saturday Encore Presentation Sara Bailey vs. Evelin Bermudez
programme.desc: LIVE September 21st from the Hard Rock Casino in Ottawa, Canada, undefeated WBA Light Flyweight World Champion Sara Bailey of Ontario and IBF/WBO Light Flyweight World Champion Evelin Bermudez of Argentina meet to unify the titles. Bailey claimed her title in just her fourth professional fight defeating Guadalupe Bautista, and Bermudez became a two-time champion when beating Tania Enriquez before two successful defenses.

programme.title: Rabat 2023 - Episode 3
programme.desc: Rabat, Morocco welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. programme.title: Chael Sonnen, Matt Serra, Clay Guida and more!
programme.desc: This episode follows former UFC welterweight champion Matt Serra around his hometown in New Jersey for a look at the lighter side of this intense competitor. Ring girl Natasha Wicks shows us that the fighters aren't the only ones with the big guns. Plus a behind the scenes look at the UFC Fan Expo and an interview with MMA legend Chael Sonnen.

programme.title: FS MMA Andrei Semenov vs. Matt Ewin
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Sambo practicioner and fromer UFC veteran, Andrei "White Shark" Semenov meets Matt "The Hardest" Ewin in St. Petersburg, Russia.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Antonio Margarito vs. Paul Williams

programme.title: Biomechanics of Body Preparation
programme.desc: In this episode we follow one of our martial artists as he goes through a grueling tournament and how he uses technology to help him prepare for it.

programme.title: Tokyo Grand Slam
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Tokyo Grand Slam where the home nation is looking to dominate as they fielded 7 of Japan's 8 world champions. Plus we catch up with Japan's brother and sister superstars, the Abe's.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Danny Garcia vs. Erik Morales
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Danny Garcia looking to win the WBC super lightweight championship when he squares off with Erik Morales, but Garcia must battle back after suffering a nose injury early on. Also on the card, former world champions Hector Camacho and Adonis Stevenson.

programme.desc: Okidoodle is jealous of the new RoboCar, which can go super fast! Will Okidoodle be able to catch up with the RoboCar and earn back Messy's admiration?

programme.title: Omelette
programme.desc: Bingo is helping Mum make an omelette for Dad's birthday breakfast, but cracking eggs is harder than it looks, and Dad is getting hungrier by the minute.

programme.title: Promises
programme.desc: Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mum's word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why it's important not to break them.

programme.title: The Metal Detector Badge
programme.desc: Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: The Diary Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Master of Puppets
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, there's a story told in blocks, the tale of a first tooth, a fable about changing emotions, and a yarn involving the Squirrels as puppets.

programme.title: Cool, Man
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.title: Himalayan Heroes, Nepal
programme.desc: Hoping to follow in his great-aunt's footsteps, Glitch enlists the help of a sceptical Foz and a friendly yak in order to find a yeti in the Himalayas.

programme.title: Dance Mode
programme.desc: After Dad eats her last chip, Bingo is given three chances to put Mum and Dad in "Dance Mode" as payback. But the others can't resist taking Bingo's turns for her.

programme.title: Daddy Putdown
programme.desc: When Mum goes out to a baby shower, Dad takes charge of the girls' evening routine. But with Bluey missing Mum, Dad has to pull out all the games he knows to keep them entertained.

programme.title: Andy and the Baby Humpback Whale
programme.desc: In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to the Pacific ocean, off the tropical islands of Hawaii, on a baby animal mission to see how a baby humpback whale prepares for its 5000 km migration North to the rich feeding grounds of Alaska.

programme.title: Mission: Day Off
programme.desc: Sylvie and Katrina stop to help Dawn from the toy shop, Harry the Baker and Pete the Postie on their way to the park cafe on their day off.

programme.title: Mandrill and Sand Lizard
programme.desc: Aneeshwar Kunchala and Lizzie Daly meet the mandrill and sand lizard, and reveal their wild connection - they use colour to attract a mate.

programme.title: Captain Captain's Classic Clips
programme.desc: Squawk takes us on a journey to find Captain Captain's top Swashbuckle moments, her classic clips, which are all hidden along a pirate treasure map.

programme.title: The Train Badge
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: The Dancing Bug Badge
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: The Teamwork Badge
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Everglades National Park, Florida
programme.desc: The Go Jetters save the Florida Everglades when hungry alligators chase Glitch's picnic.

programme.title: Timgad Ruins, Algeria
programme.desc: The Go Jetters visit Timgad in Algeria, but someone is playing games with their click-ons.

programme.title: Gordon Gets the Giggles
programme.desc: Gordon becomes very worried when he gets a serious case of the giggles. He must find a way to control his laughter before it does any damage.

programme.title: Lemon Cafe
programme.desc: Sarah & Duck discover a Lemon Cafe in the park, but it seems to be nearly closing time...

programme.title: Star Renovation
programme.desc: Venus has attempted to redecorate the night sky, but now Sarah can't find any of her favourite constellations...

programme.title: Dig
programme.desc: Stanley helps Fifi and Fred dig up some shiny stones in their garden that turn out to be old bits of mosaic. With the help of Cynthia and Hettie, they put the pieces back together.

programme.title: Farm
programme.desc: Amare asks Stanley to help her on the farm. Stanley asks Little Woo, Fred and Fifi to join him in sowing seeds, watering plants and picking apples, all whilst having fun.

programme.title: Honestly, Monty
programme.desc: Monty becomes nervous when he breaks Jeanie's project and doesn't know whether to tell her. He soon learns that you should always be honest.

programme.title: It's Time to Explore the Park
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran have a relaxing yoga class with Auntie Dee before using their senses to enjoy a day at the park.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.desc: Judo desperately wants to play in the dirt with Bluey and Bingo, but she is not supposed to get herself dirty.

programme.title: The Decider
programme.desc: The Heelers and Lucky's family get together to watch the big game, a fun family experiences that gets a little tense.

programme.title: Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Dad tells Bluey and Bingo a real-life fairy tale about growing up in a wild place called the '80s, about a boy who was cursed when he was mean to his little brother.

programme.title: The Camping Badge
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: The Medicine Badge
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Song of Peace
programme.desc: Betty recalls the first time she pushed the red button, the Squirrels explore a range of emotions with Happy, Angry Bull tells a not-so-sleepy bedtime story, and the gerbils sing.

programme.desc: Hoping to follow in his great-aunt's footsteps, Glitch enlists the help of a sceptical Foz and a friendly yak in order to find a yeti in the Himalayas.

programme.title: Cabbage
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's the marvellous Cabbage.

programme.title: Gooseberry
programme.desc: Gooseberry sings a song about everything you have to do to become a Gooseberry Club member

programme.title: Evil Pea Takes a Break
programme.desc: The Cobs try to capture Supertato while Evil Pea is on holiday, but it goes wrong, resulting in Evil Pea getting covered in flour and custard over in the Bath Product's Aisle.

programme.title: Super Birthday
programme.desc: Supertato is delighted when Evil Pea comes to his birthday party but Carrot is suspicious. Soon Evil Pea unleashes the Mini Peas who try to steal Supertato's birthday present.

programme.title: The Sibling Badge
programme.desc: Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: The Monster Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: The Diary Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.desc: Betty recalls the first time she pushed the red button, the Squirrels explore a range of emotions with Happy, Angry Bull tells a not-so-sleepy bedtime story, and the gerbils sing.

programme.desc: Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.desc: When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.title: Pizza Girls
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo make mud pizzas and deliver them to the grown-ups, but their pedal car's wheel keeps falling off.

programme.title: Driving
programme.desc: With only five minutes to play 'Driving', Bluey and Mum race against the clock to buy milk for a grumpy guest and have to escape an angry shopkeeper.

programme.title: Feeling Better
programme.desc: It's time to wake up but Tinky Winky isn't feeling well. Soon, Tinky Winky feels better but now Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po don't feel well.

programme.title: Safari Party
programme.desc: Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing on safari.

programme.title: Frog Pond
programme.desc: Hooper makes a new froggy friend called Croaksie. But when Hooper realises his new pal needs a home, Hooper tries to find a way to make him one before he hops off.

programme.title: Dog Loves Record Breakers
programme.desc: Pug wants to break a world record. Dog suggests they go to the North Pole so that Pug can be the first pug to reach the Pole.

programme.desc: Messy and friends must play the OKIDO concert. It's time for OKIDO to make some noise.

programme.desc: JoJo & Gran Gran make Sorrel drinks together, and JoJo comes up with her own recipe that uses her favourite ingredients.

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.title: Pizza Girls
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo make mud pizzas and deliver them to the grown-ups, but their pedal car's wheel keeps falling off.

programme.title: Driving
programme.desc: With only five minutes to play 'Driving', Bluey and Mum race against the clock to buy milk for a grumpy guest and have to escape an angry shopkeeper.

programme.title: Feeling Better
programme.desc: It's time to wake up but Tinky Winky isn't feeling well. Soon, Tinky Winky feels better but now Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po don't feel well.

programme.title: Safari Party
programme.desc: Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing on safari.

programme.title: Frog Pond
programme.desc: Hooper makes a new froggy friend called Croaksie. But when Hooper realises his new pal needs a home, Hooper tries to find a way to make him one before he hops off.

programme.title: Dog Loves Record Breakers
programme.desc: Pug wants to break a world record. Dog suggests they go to the North Pole so that Pug can be the first pug to reach the Pole.

programme.title: Okidoasis

programme.title: Daydreamer Monty

programme.desc: JoJo & Gran Gran make Sorrel drinks together, and JoJo comes up with her own recipe that uses her favourite ingredients.

programme.title: Seacow Snow Trail

programme.title: Gordon and Rebecca - Coming Through!

programme.title: Movie - Endhiran
programme.desc: Vaseegaran, a brilliant scientist, builds Chitti, a unique robot programmed to protect mankind and also feel human emotions. Problems arise when Chitti falls in love with his girlfriend.

programme.title: Movie - Ennavale
programme.desc: Lakshmi, a landlord's daughter, encourages James, a struggling singer, to gain recognition. However when James proposes to her, Lakshmi turns him down due to her bitter past.

programme.title: Movie - Urchagam
programme.desc: Jency and Ganesh love each other, but she has to get married to Nicholas, a rich entrepreneur from London. He had financed her mother's surgery, so in gratitude, Jency agrees to marry him.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: Fillers

programme.title: Movie - Jithan
programme.desc: Surya,who leads a tough life at home,loves Priya who barely acknowledges him.She is in love with another guy.When Surya gets the power to become invisible,he begins to take charge of his life.

programme.title: Movie - Sullaan
programme.desc: A poor youth has run-ins with a money-lender known to charge high rates and then pursue those who fail to repay him. The young man is forced to retaliate when the money-lender attacks his family.

programme.title: Movie - Manam kothi paravaigal
programme.desc: The son of a construction business owner falls in love with his neighbour's daughter. His life gets in danger when he learns that her father is a criminal.

programme.title: Movie - Run
programme.desc: Siva, who comes to Chennai to pursue higher studies, falls in love with Priya on a bus. However, when he learns that her brother is a gangster, he assesses the stakes involved in pursuing her.

programme.title: Movie - Motta Siva Ketta Siva
programme.desc: Shivakumar IPS, a corrupt police officer, joins GK, a local politician, in his immoral activities. When GK's brother kills his best friend, he decides to turn his life around.

programme.title: Movie - Aasal
programme.desc: Two brothers envy their step-brother Shiva as he is their father's favourite. Since their plan to deal in drugs and arms is opposed by Shiva, the two brothers hatch a devious plan to bump him off.

programme.title: Movie - Uyirthiru 420
programme.desc: A conman falls for the girl he was deceiving and decides to work as an honest man. While working in a hotel, he discovers that his boss is being troubled by a high profile man and plans to help him by conning the man.

programme.title: Movie - Vadugapatti Mapillai
programme.desc: When Vadivu's city-based fiance, Vijay, refuses to marry her for her simple looks, her father swears that he'll get them married anyhow. She then changes into the avatar of Jeena and enters his life.

programme.title: Movie - Chellamay
programme.desc: A young man follows his newlywed neighbour Mythili from Chennai to Goa when she moves there with her husband, Raghunandan. He ends up kidnapping Mythili when his obsession takes a drastic turn.

programme.title: Movie -Jackson Durai
programme.desc: A police inspector falls in love with a village leader's daughter. To win the leader's approval, the policeman is asked to stay several days in a haunted house.

programme.title: Movie - Anniyan

programme.title: Lady Flower Fist
programme.desc: Mui Tsui Fa (Kwan Wing Ho) met Fong Tak (Kong Wa), the richest man in Guangzhou, when she visited her father. They had some misunderstandings and were against each other. Then, Fa offended the General and she had to marry Tak to avoid being punished. Fa, in becoming Tak‘s fourth concubine, aroused jealousy and hate in Tak’s house._x000D__x000D_The Tso Sect leader held a contest to seek a husband for his daugher, Siu Wan (Chan Siu Ha). Fa won the match in a man‘s disguise.

programme.title: Fate of The Clairvoyant
programme.desc: Pui (Amy Chan) was a dutiful wife and mother. She devoted all her time to her family and didn’t realize her unattractive outlook was driving her husband away. She was shocked when she discovered her husband, Wo (Keung Tai Wai), was having an affair with the sexy movie star, Ling (Valerie Chow). Her heart broke when Wo asked for a divorce._x000D__x000D_Pui’s confidence was badly shattered.

programme.title: Go With The Float
programme.desc: Former stuntman Hung Sap-yat (Wayne Lai) hooks up with his buddies, who are also former film crew members, Chung Chi-wai (Willie Wai), Fong Sum (Wong Yee Kam), Lee Sai-fong (Timothy Cheng) and Ng Kam-yin (Jimmy Au) as they want to organize a retrospective for Sap-yat’s late wife Miu Miu (Mimi Kung). They reminisce about the old days. The chums even regroup and shoot a movie based on a completed screenplay entitled Flying Skill from yesteryear.

programme.title: Pillow Case Of Mystery, A
programme.desc: SZE SAI LUN (Au Yeung Chun Wah, Bobby), the magistrate of Jiangdu County once makes a mistake, making an innocent person taking its own life by hanging. Since then, LUN loses his faith in himself and his will is down. Later by chance, LUN obtains a Dream-pillow. Whenever he comes across any difficult cases, the Pillow-spirit (Lo Hoi Pang) will appear in his dream and present him the puzzle that holds the key to crack the case.

programme.title: Cold Blood Warm Heart
programme.desc: Bong (Adam Cheng) blamed Sing (Kwan Hoi San) for abandoning his mother and refused to acknowledge him as his father even he was one of the richest men in town. He loved and admired his foster father Kin (Bow Fong), who was a retired cop. He and his brother Lap (Gallen Lo) followed Kin’s footsteps and joined the force.

programme.title: Eternity
programme.desc: Stunt man Fung (Alex Fong) and Inspector Yeung were good friends and they were wooing the same girl, Wai (Jessica Hester Hsuan). Wai chosed Fung and they went on a holiday in Xi’an. There, Fung met a girl named Hung (Faye Wong), whom he had faint memory of her saving him twenty years ago. Yet he was astonished as Hung looked the same without aging a bit. Since then, his mind was preoccupied with Hung.

programme.title: My Sister of Eternal Flower
programme.desc: FA LAI-CHU (Charmaine Sheh) is a kindhearted and innocent woman with the IQ of a ten-year-old. When her parents passed away, she shouldered the responsibility for the care of her younger sister and brother.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes IV
programme.desc: Senior Chemist of Forensic Science Division Ko On (Raymond Wong), Senior Forensic Pathologist Man Ka-hei (Selena Lee) and Kowloon West Regional Crime Unit Senior Inspector Kwok Fai-wong (Shaun Tam) are the pillars of Crime Busting Trio leading a team of outstanding individuals. They unravel appalling schemes by using advanced forensic science. Their mastery of pathology enables them to decode secrets of the human anatomy.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes IV
programme.desc: Senior Chemist of Forensic Science Division Ko On (Raymond Wong), Senior Forensic Pathologist Man Ka-hei (Selena Lee) and Kowloon West Regional Crime Unit Senior Inspector Kwok Fai-wong (Shaun Tam) are the pillars of Crime Busting Trio leading a team of outstanding individuals. They unravel appalling schemes by using advanced forensic science. Their mastery of pathology enables them to decode secrets of the human anatomy.

programme.title: Wax and Wane
programme.desc: YUNG SHING-FUN (Lau Siu Ming) and his cousin MAN WING-CHEONG (Chow Chung) have been at odds for years over the trade name right of a noodle shop. YUNG YI-TSUN (Kwok Tsun On), FUN’s eldest son, is engaging in a property developing project. Not entirely willingly, he offers to buy out the location of CHEONG’s noodle shop with his company’s shares. He also invites CHEONG and his son, MAN KA-FUNG (Chan Kam Hung), to join the company’s management.

programme.title: Learning Curve Of A Warlord, The
programme.desc: In the Warlord Era, DIK KEI (Dicky Cheung) is a lowly captain without any ambition. He has been using his crafty ideas and fast-talking to survive the past twenty years. Due to successfully saving Marshal MUNG TAI-TUNG (Tsoi Kwok Hing), he is successively promoted seven grades and becomes a bully calling the shots in Sing Wai Town.

programme.title: Bonita Bikin Hatiku Terpotek Potek
programme.desc: Bonita, aka Boni, the broken-hearted planner who always felt that there was someone better than her, fell in love with two guys who changed her life, making her realize that she didn't need to compare herself to others. What she wanted was not always what was best for her.

programme.title: Cinta Karena Cinta
programme.desc: 15 years ago, Jenar found himself in a tragic event that claimed the lives of his family. Mila, who is Jenar's older sister, is still alive after Ayu's adoption. Jenar's life changes after meeting Mirza, a man who is attracted to her.

programme.title: Neng Cantik Parasit Hatiku Aku Rak Popo
programme.desc: Tiara must pretend to be a rich girl in the hope of attracting a rich guy who can change her family's life.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Love Story The Series S2
programme.desc: Kendra's meeting with Maudy began with an accidental meeting at the Villa, that's where Ken first saw Maudy and immediately fell in love. At first Maudy was disturbed by Ken's presence, the horse Maudy was riding accidentally got angry and fell into the river, not long after Ken jumped to save Maudy.

programme.title: Bonita Bikin Hatiku Terpotek Potek
programme.desc: Bonita, aka Boni, the broken-hearted planner who always felt that there was someone better than her, fell in love with two guys who changed her life, making her realize that she didn't need to compare herself to others. What she wanted was not always what was best for her.

programme.title: ANAK BAND
programme.desc: Cahaya, who was trading with his vegetable cart, felt like he got a durian collapse when suddenly Gilang, the vocalist of The Junas, Cahaya's favorite band, ran up to Cahaya asking for help so that Cahaya helped him avoid the pursuit of his fans. Light, who was kind and always optimistic, happily helped Gilang hide. Once safe, Gilang came out of hiding and thanked Light. Light was very happy because it turned out that Gilang was very friendly.

programme.title: Bisaku Hanya Mencintaimu, Mas Sosis
programme.desc: Nela ran away from home and moved into a boarding house to avoid an arranged marriage by her parents. However, Nela felt uncomfortable because the boarding house room she was staying in was close to Dito's chicken coop. This often led to arguments between Nela and Dito. Actually, Dito is a master's program student. However, he chose to start a business selling viral sausage instead of working in an office like his brother, Fito.

programme.title: Tutorial Ajak Nikah Jalur Express
programme.desc: An older sister who is seriously ill and has to take care of her only child because her husband is irresponsible. She asks her younger sister, Zahra, and her friend, Andika, to get married in front of her while she is sick so that they can take care of her niece.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta

programme.title: Bidan Desa Penuh Cinta
programme.desc: Rara is a midwife in a village. In an incident, Rara meets Gigih, a vegetable seller. When Rara has a patient who wants to give birth, Rara stops Gigih, who is on his way to the market. Gigih is very upset with Rara because they have met twice in incidents that have annoyed him. One day, Gigih's parents fall ill and need to be examined immediately. Despite still being angry with Rara, Gigih reluctantly asks her to check on his mother's condition.

programme.title: CINTA AMARA
programme.desc: An engineered tragedy left 6-month-old Aziza separated from her mother. However, the baby was rescued by her grandfather and taken as far away as possible, so that her granddaughter would have no further contact with the Nirwan family, the kayakers who own a famous bakery company. Burhan, the baby's grandfather entrusted his granddaughter to his confidant, whose wife was pregnant.

programme.title: Cantik Tapi Bau Tapi Aku Mau
programme.desc: With Nadia's help, Bara is able to manage the farm and also thwart the marriage of Tania, his girlfriend. However, even after Bara and Tania's relationship is approved, Bara continues to think about Nadia.

programme.desc: After Schwoz creates a disease that accidentally effects Charlotte, Henry, his family, and even Ray, he quarantines them in Henry's house in order to find a cure.

programme.title: Raph Thinks It Through
programme.desc: Raph's strength won't save him when he's caught between the Mechazoids and the notorious street gang known as Purple Dragons! Raph's going to have to use his head to get out of this one!

programme.title: Fast Feud / Never Friending Story
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid try to take down the obnoxious burger restaurant that opened up across the street. // After picking Par as his new best friend, Bobby realizes he may be in over his head.

programme.title: Bunstoppable
programme.desc: While preparing bao for the Chinese Cultural Fair, Sid and Adelaide face off against time-hopping bandits!

programme.title: Safe Deposit Krabs / Plankton's Pet
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs gets trapped in Bikini Bottom's brand-new bank, and it's up to SpongeBob & Patrick to save him. // After failing again to steal the Krabby Patty formula, Plankton gets a pet to cheer himself up.

programme.title: Kenny the Cat / Yeti Krabs
programme.desc: SpongeBob will do anything to get to meet his newest hero, Kenny The Cat. // Attempting to get more work out of Squidward, Mr. Krabs spins the story of the monstrous Yeti Crab, which eats lazy workers.

programme.title: Lost in Bikini Bottom / Tutor Sauce
programme.desc: SpongeBob tries to take a shortcut to work, but becomes lost along the way. // After failing his driver's test again, Mr. Krabs decides to teach SpongeBob how to drive himself.

programme.title: Patty-Poo / Swaptoberfest
programme.desc: Patrick spawns an adorable mini-Patrick who quickly becomes the star of the show (until he outgrows the role). // The Star family celebrates the Klopnodian holiday Swaptoberfest by swapping identities with each other.

programme.title: No Egrets / Meal Ticket
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid help Casey run his family food truck... at the Yoon Kwon concert! // Sergio is in for a treat when a group of baby birds think he's their mama!

programme.title: Fool's Gold / Flight Plan
programme.desc: When they find a treasure map, the Casagrandes go on a wild search for Pancho Villa's gold. // Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: Sitting Bull / The Spies Who Love Me
programme.desc: The older sisters reluctantly let Lynn into their babysitting club but she quickly proves to be too aggressive. // Ronnie Anne wants to go downtown. But her grandparents think it's too dangerous, so they decide to spy on her.

programme.title: Jeers for Fears / Tea Tale Heart
programme.desc: After agreeing to go to The Royal Woods House of Terror, Linc and Clyde have to toughen up and face their fears. // Lola discovers Lucy has an old, fragile doll and decides she must borrow it - no matter what Lucy says.

programme.title: Plankton Retires / Trident Trouble
programme.desc: Plankton closes the Chum Bucket and moves to a new town, but Mr. Krabs suspects he's still up to no good. // When SpongeBob accidentally picks up Neptune's magic trident, there's no telling what trouble he may cause!

programme.title: The Incredible Shrinking Sponge / Sportz?
programme.desc: SpongeBob must figure out how to do his job after accidentally shrinking himself. // Squidward invents a new sport to get back at SpongeBob and Patrick for annoying him.

programme.title: The Getaway / Lost and Found
programme.desc: When SpongeBob mistakes an escaped convict for his driving instructor, it's the new teacher who learns a lesson. // When Krabs sends him searching for a missing toy, SpongeBob finds himself lost... in the lost & found!

programme.title: Patrick's Coupon / Out of the Picture
programme.desc: Patrick has a coupon for free ice cream, but he'll have to get to the store if he wants to use it! // Krabs buys Squidward's art, but to make a profit on his purchase he'll have to get the artist out of the picture!

programme.title: Operation Birthday Takeback Pt 1 / Operation Birthday Takeback Pt 2
programme.desc: When an old foe of Cosmo and Wanda's takes over Dev's birthday party as part of a money-making scheme, Hazel stages a series of zany traps to save the day. Meanwhile, Cosmo, Wanda, and Peri discover Dev's dad has been investigating Hazel!

programme.title: Orange Carpet All Access: Tim Rex
programme.desc: Spoiler Alert: We are about to introduce the cutest and newest family of dinosaurs to our NJR Global Channel! Let's welcome Tim Rex and his family of space dinosaurs!

programme.title: Wellsington Hotellsington / 1500 Minutes of Fame
programme.desc: Hazel wishes her apartment building were a luxury hotel for a sleepover, but finds herself too busy to enjoy it with friends. // When Hazel's wish for 1,500 minutes of fame angers Principal Krentz, she must find a way to speed up time.

programme.title: City Slickers / Fool Me Twice
programme.desc: Lori and Lincoln visit the city. Lori struggles to be a city girl and Lincoln finds Ronnie Anne has changed. // The family has a new plan to dodge Luan's April Fool's Day pranking: stunt doubles

programme.title: Net Gains / Pipe Dreams
programme.desc: Lynn desperately wants to win a basketball championship but gets drafted onto a terrible team. // Mom and Dad are sick of waiting in the long bathroom line so they decide to build a secret bathroom.

programme.title: The Price of Admission
programme.desc: After seeing a scary movie (that his parents told him not to), Lincoln can't go to sleep and pulls an all-nighter.

programme.title: The Fishbowl / Married to Money
programme.desc: Sandy tries to study SpongeBob and Patrick's behavior, but her science experiment goes horribly awry. // Mr. Krabs takes Plankton's advice, and finally marries the only thing he ever loved...money!

programme.title: Mall Girl Pearl / Two Thumbs Down
programme.desc: Pearl gets a job to be cool like her friends, but the only store that's hiring is the lamest store at the mall! // SpongeBob loses the use of his thumbs, and must get them back in working order before his entire life falls apart.

programme.title: Cherry Bad Things
programme.desc: Cherry visits, and the Thundermans discover she still has her superpowers. Cherry promises to remove them after her girls' day with Phoebe and Chloe, but the powers malfunction and puts the group in danger. Max hosts Jinx, making Colosso jealous.

programme.title: Family Lies
programme.desc: It's Parents' Night at SW.A.G. and Ray must get Danger Force to take a picture with their parents in the school or be shut down. But things get complicated when Chapa hires Jake Hart to be her fake dad.

programme.title: Grave Danger
programme.desc: When Ray starts behaving strangely, Henry and Charlotte investigate and are surprised to discover what's been causing it.

programme.title: Patrickle Jokes / Pat Roast
programme.desc: Patrick and Squidina go undercover to investigate a corrupt novelty product factory. // The Patrick Show presents the "Roast of Patrick Star".

programme.title: Plankton Retires / Trident Trouble
programme.desc: Plankton closes the Chum Bucket and moves to a new town, but Mr. Krabs suspects he's still up to no good. // When SpongeBob accidentally picks up Neptune's magic trident, there's no telling what trouble he may cause!

programme.title: The Incredible Shrinking Sponge / Sportz?
programme.desc: SpongeBob must figure out how to do his job after accidentally shrinking himself. // Squidward invents a new sport to get back at SpongeBob and Patrick for annoying him.

programme.title: A Grave Mistake / Leader of the Rack
programme.desc: Lucy faces off against her friend Haiku to become the new president of the Young Morticians' Club at school. // Leni is promoted to temporary manager at work, but she worries about remaining good friends with Miguel and Fiona.

programme.title: Suite and Sour / Back in Black
programme.desc: After Mom and Dad win a trip to a resort, they decide to take the kids - but only because they promised to behave. // When Lucy gets a crush on a 'regular and normal' boy, her sisters give her a makeover.

programme.title: Making the Grade / Vantastic Voyage
programme.desc: When Lincoln's four-year-old sister, Lisa, gets put into his 5th grade class, his social standing is at stake! // Sick of their family van always falling apart, the kids decide to try and trick Dad into buying a cool new van.

programme.title: A Dinosaur in Dimmadelphia / Fearless
programme.desc: When Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur, Cosmo and Wanda bring a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period to present day. // Hazel wishes Jasmine was fearless, but the wish goes awry when Jasmine's fears escape and invade the school!

programme.title: Department of Magical Violations / Teacher's Pal
programme.desc: Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must pass Wish Trials or Jorgen will assign Hazel to a new fairy who's more efficient, but less fun. // Nervous about not fitting in with the other kids at school, Hazel wishes to be friends with the teachers instead.

programme.title: The Yard Sale
programme.desc: GrandPat prevents his precious memories from being sold at a family yard sale.

programme.title: Plankton's Intern / Patrick's Tantrum
programme.desc: Plankton needs help stealing the formula, so he hires an intern who knows more about Mr. Krabs than anyone. // Patrick goes into a destructive fit whenever he hears a bell, so his friends help him in their own ways.

programme.title: Drive Hard
programme.desc: Captain Man and Danger Force are hired to deliver a big budget Hollywood movie to its premiere but the producer warns them that rival studios and internet trolls are out to steal the movie.

programme.title: Faulty Powers
programme.desc: After a training accident causes a glitch in Chloe's powers, Max and Phoebe look for a cure. After Max thinks he's solved the issue, he allows Chloe to attend a party with friends, but his treatment creates brand new powers Chloe can't control.

It pits a team of 12 top golfers from the United States against a team of 12 top golfers from Europe. This event is named after Samuel Ryder, an English businessman who donated the trophy.

programme.desc: Ikhsan intends to work in the city, but the city dwellers annoy him with their arrogant behavior. Ikhsan is forced to return to work at his father Mawar's cattle farm. Mawar is madly in love with Ikhsan.

programme.title: Tanpa Kamu Warga Indonesia Kurang Satu
programme.desc: Bian was shocked when he realized that the girl was Qiara, an old friend of his. However, Qiara could not recognize Bian because she had lost her sight due to an accident. Bian felt sad. From that moment on, Qiara and Bian became very close, even though Qiara actually already had a boyfriend.

programme.title: KARNAVAL SCTV 2024
programme.desc: The SCTV Carnival is a variety show broadcast on SCTV that comes to your city. It is enlivened by the cast of SCTV soap operas and local musicians. This time, the SCTV Carnival is coming to Indramayu with special and surprising guest stars.

programme.title: Tutorial Ajak Nikah Jalur Express
programme.desc: It tells the story of an older sister who is seriously ill and has to take care of her only child because her husband is irresponsible. The older sister asks her younger sister, Zahra, and her friend, Andika, to get married in front of her while she is sick so that they can take care of her niece.

programme.title: Temenan Udah, Pacaran Yang Belum
programme.desc: Olive (Amanda Salmakhira), who works as a jewelry store clerk, likes to approach men who already have girlfriends. However, in reality, the men she approaches no longer like her and even consider her a destroyer of happiness. Ilham (Ridho Ilahi), her friend, does not want Olive to get involved in such situations because it will inevitably involve him as well.

programme.desc: Once a symbol of splendour, Karikal Mahal saw ruin as Moona Kader Sultan fell from grace. Revived by the Malayan Magic Circle's dazzling performances, its magic disappeared with the onset of WWII.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 2 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: KAKI NYANYI is a fun-filled and innovative entertainment programme that brings the synergy of local singers on one stage, giving viewers an eye-opening experience to watch our local singers pushing their limits and expanding their capabilities. _x000D_24 established and up-and-coming Malay local singers will be gathered on one stage.

programme.title: Episode 13 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: Join our documentary series as we traverse Indonesian cities, uncovering new and exciting places brimming with culture and fun. Embark on an adventure to experience the vibrant heart of Indonesia like never before. Each episode is a captivating journey that immerses you in the local way of life, providing a deeper connection to this enchanting archipelago.

programme.title: Episode 13 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: Embark on an epic cilinary adventure across the diverse cities of Indonesia in this captivating documentary series. Join our intrepid hosts as they traverse the archipelago in search of delectable and culturally rish dishes. From bustling street food stalls to hidden gems, each episode unveils the flavors, stories and traditions that make Indonesia cuisine a tantalizing journey worth savoring.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 2 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: The competition heats up at Piala Suara Serumpun 2024! As emotions soar, every detail from lyrics to costumes becomes key. With teams pushing creative boundaries and reinventing tradition, who will stand out in this race for artistic excellence? Don't miss this thrilling episode as the competition nears its peak, with the unveiling of top honours for individual categories, the top three team rankings, and the crowning of the overall Champion!

programme.title: (PG) Episode 4 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: While many have jumped on the bandwagon of being environmentally-conscious, the heroes' featured in this episode have gone beyond the usual reduce, reuse and recycle mantra to actively care for the environment. Find out how their contributions affect the world we live in.

programme.title: Episode 1 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: A brand new show with Kak Lina, as we follow Kak Lina as she takeover a celeb's home bringing along her brand of chaos-ness, in this reality show.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 9 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: A silat master checks into the hotel and the employees are made to train under him. The staff continue to be extra nice to Nasar believing him to be rich and powerful.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 5 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: Sara and Ben reminisce the good old days. Imran and Rina become close. Auni tries to get out of her desperate situation and seeks Fikri's help to find a job. Remy find Husin a job which Sara disapproves of. Sara finds out Hilda brought in new WAF member and she is shocked by who Hilda deliberately recruits.

programme.title: Episode 6 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: In Ai, Ai, Cef!, kids take over the kitchen as head chefs and go head to head in the ultimate cook-off! But every chef needs an assistant, and in AI, AI, CEF, two stars will join our little chefs in their mission to improve the judges - but with their faces hidden behind masks. Who are these assistant chefs? In each episode, two well-known figures --- actors, singers, influencers, athletes, housing agents and more --- join the show as mystery guest.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 3 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: Caesa Ramadhanis will take you to explore Indonesia's beautiful landscapes, learn about Indonesia's rich culture, and taste the richness of Indonesian traditional cuisine. Not only the touristy places, Eye of an Explorer also shows you how to live like locals wherever you travel and learn some local wisdom from the natives. It spreads the spirit to explore Indonesia from Sabang to Merauke.

programme.title: Episode 13 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: Join our documentary series as we traverse Indonesian cities, uncovering new and exciting places brimming with culture and fun. Embark on an adventure to experience the vibrant heart of Indonesia like never before. Each episode is a captivating journey that immerses you in the local way of life, providing a deeper connection to this enchanting archipelago.

programme.title: Episode 13 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: Embark on an epic cilinary adventure across the diverse cities of Indonesia in this captivating documentary series. Join our intrepid hosts as they traverse the archipelago in search of delectable and culturally rish dishes. From bustling street food stalls to hidden gems, each episode unveils the flavors, stories and traditions that make Indonesia cuisine a tantalizing journey worth savoring.

programme.title: Episode 181
programme.desc: (Live) Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Episode 4 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: Watch how a barista, Nurdiyanah showcases her innovative approach to cooking and taking all the risks to emerge victorious in the arena. And will Hidayat, the bus driver who loves cooking will cook up a storm and satisfies the palettes of guest judge, Hafidz Rahman and regional chef, Chef Zam?

programme.title: (PG) Episode 10 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: The truth about Nasar’s background and financial situation comes out when Nasar bumps into his childhood friend at work. When a production shoot comes to the hotel, a girl from Sudin’s life is part of the crew.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 36 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: After Aizril's confrontation, Aleya's parents storm out of the house in disappointment, leaving Aleya furious with Aizril. Datin Sharifah Rosnah and Azreen seize this opportunity for their own benefit.

programme.title: Dream Maker
programme.desc: Dream Maker is a reality show that invites celebrities to accomplish their dream pursuing mission, pursue celebrities' dreams.

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the "yin and yang combination" to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: The Dragon Creek
programme.desc: This wuxia murder mystery film talks about a young girl whose father was ruthlessly murdered during China's early republican era. She has a list of villains who have been plotting against her father and together with her elder brother, the young girl sets out on a journey to hunt down the secret serial killer.

programme.title: Brothers from the Walled City
programme.desc: Two orphaned brothers growing up in Kowloon's Walled City - the place where people are forced to live with indecent businesses of sex, gambling and drugs controlled by triads - take very different life paths. Chin works at a cabaret but keeps away from sins, while Kang is drawn to the sleazy underworld. Are their destinies shaped by the "walls"?

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: A titular gang of misfits come together to protect a patriotic general from a scheming usurper. To this end, the unlikely heroes act as the general's escorts on a dangerous journey to a distant British consulate, beset by enemies and sinister Japanese interference along the way.

programme.title: Notorious Eight
programme.desc: The young Chen Chi-chin (Liu Yung) loses heavily to experienced gambler Hu Kuan-ten (Lo Lieh). His father loses at cards and dies of shock. Chen appeals to his uncle who summons seven fellow professional gamblers to carry out vengeance. Much more than a gambling film, this is a thrilling melting pot of martial arts stars, extortion, illicit love, poker-face vengeance, and all sorts of edge-of-your-seat gambling duels.

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: Ode to Gallantry
programme.desc: In this surprisingly light-hearted "Venoms" martial arts adventure, a lone wanderer is repeatedly mistaken for someone else and drawn into a number of violent battles.

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: Lion VS Lion
programme.desc: The traditional lion dance has never looked so good as in Lion VS Lion which captures the most impressive sequences of lion dancing on film. Besides being loaded with enjoyable martial arts chicanery, film historians can revel because it's also the first film that clearly demonstrates the intricacies and differences between the traditional Northern and Southern lion dancing techniques.

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keeper's daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: For lovers of the Shaw's sumptuous production and martial arts expertise, this action adventure in the "Jackie Chan style" is a special treat. A persecuted waiter turns to a "drunken master" for help when a restaurant customer turns out to be a kung-fu harbinger of doom!

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: Two Champions of Shaolin
programme.desc: Set in the Qing Dynasty, the Shaolin clan wants to overthrow Qing and restore the Ming Dynasty, while the Wudang clan is backed by the Qing government. The two renowned clans eventually set themselves up against each other, and a series of vicious fighting has just begun...

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: The Naval Commandos
programme.desc: The Chinese Navy is attempting to defend its coastline from a Japanese attack, they send their commando unit led by Cui Hsia into the mainland to enlist help to thwart the Japanese before they attack. The commandos enlist the help of Song San and Shiao Liu to kill the Japanese officers led by Shan Mao and destroy their attacking ships.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70's Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sister's magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: Cheng Chung (Derek Yee) and May (Liu Hsueh-hua), a pair of lovers working on the police force, camp on an outlying island. Awakened by a strange sound, May goes out onto the beach where a violent frenzy grips her. After her return from leave, May insists Inspector Wang (Yueh Hua) in a bid to rescue some hostages. She shoots the thug under most peculiar circumstances. Then a series of tragedies occur.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jin's daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Usurpers Of Emperor's Power
programme.desc: The last ruler of Tang, Li Yao is deposed by Chao Kuang-jun, the founder of the Sung Dynasty. Unfortunately his actions unleash a new plague - his brother Kuang-yi - on the courts and his people. The marauding Kuang-yi rapes and plunders. As more people get involved, it turns into a bloody battlefield of betrayal. It is up to upright officials like Li Lang to put an end to it. But can one man take on the imperial army?

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: The Master Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: The famous kung fu master Wong Fei Hung teaches martial arts in Guangdong. A vicious gangster plots to harm Wong's disciples and frames him for robbery and murder. Wong has to fight against the culprit to prove his own innocence and take revenge for his disciples.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider's look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang's popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A professor's assistant stole a micro-film storing the secret of a newly invented nuclear reactor and sells it to a crime syndicate. However, the micro-film accidentally falls into the hands of a nightclub dancer and a thief in the process, leading to them being relentlessly pursued by the crime syndicate to retrieve the micro-film.

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: Disciples of the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: In the finale of this trilogy, Gordon Liu reprises his famous role, Monk San Te, as he tries to protect Fang Shih Yu, an arrogant youth who gets into trouble with the Qing officials, and nearly lands Shaolin Temple into trouble too.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Peng Nan are a devoted couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he finds out that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: Martial Club
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung and his friend Wang Yin Lin offend the young master of another rival school and the expert they hire, causing both martial arts schools to fight against each other. This is Director Liu Chia Liang's masterpiece and one of the top ten highest grossing movies in 1981.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him...

programme.title: The Longest Day in Chang'an
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] As the city of Chang'an faces a major crisis during the eve of Lantern Festival, death row prisoner Zhang Xiaojing (Lei Jia Yin) is given a critical mission to save the city of Chang'an together with Li Bi (Jackson Yee) within twelve hours.

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride
programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls 'father' is actually her real parents' enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey...

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride
programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls 'father' is actually her real parents' enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey...

programme.title: Serendipity
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Jian Mingshu (Lu Yuxiao) loses her memory after falling off a cliff, which saves her from a massacre. Rescued by her love interest Lu Chang (Wang Ziqi), they journey to the capital for imperial exams. Facing challenges together, they fall in love.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Love Virtually
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Ye Shan's marriage hits the 7-year itch. He accidentally downloads a virtual lover app and begins dating 'F'. Surprisingly, his wife is calm in the face of his "infidelity," and the trio begin a bizarre life under one roof.

programme.title: Coroner's Diary
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Qin Wan (Landy Li), the daughter of the minister of Dali Temple, relied on her superb medical and forensic skills to join hands with Prince Yan Chi (Ao Rui Peng) to solve unsolved cases and find the real culprit in order to vindicate her father.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: The Longest Day in Chang'an
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] As the city of Chang'an faces a major crisis during the eve of Lantern Festival, death row prisoner Zhang Xiaojing (Lei Jia Yin) is given a critical mission to save the city of Chang'an together with Li Bi (Jackson Yee) within twelve hours.

programme.title: The Longest Day in Chang'an

programme.title: The Masked Singer U.K. S6
programme.desc: Joel Dommett invites all of the eight remaining disguised celebrity singers to take to the stage and compete to remain anonymous. Panellists Jonathan Ross, Davina McCall, Maya Jama and Mo Gilligan choose a fifth celeb to be eliminated.

programme.title: The Masked Singer U.K. S6
programme.desc: Joel Dommett invites the seven remaining disguised singers back onto the stage to compete to remain anonymous. Panellists Jonathan Ross, Davina McCall, Maya Jama and Mo Gilligan choose the celebs to be unmasked in a double elimination.

programme.title: The Masked Singer U.K. S6
programme.desc: It is the Semi-Final of the 2025 series of The Masked Singer. Richard E. Grant joins the panel. Three masked performers will progress to the Grand Final but two losing semi-finallists will be unmasked.

programme.title: The Masked Singer U.K. S6
programme.desc: All will be revealed in the Final of The Masked Singer. The 3 finalists perform duets with characters from previous series. Danny Jones joins the panel. Will Dressed Crab, Pufferfish or Wolf be crowned the winner? Who is behind the mask?

programme.title: The Masked Singer U.K. S6
programme.desc: Joel Dommett is back with the singing contest. Maya Jama joins Jonathan Ross, Davina McCall and Mo Gilligan on the celebrity panel trying to guess who is performing as Teeth, Snail, Tattoo, Kingfisher, Spag Bol and Dressed.

programme.title: The Masked Singer U.K. S6
programme.desc: Joel Dommett hosts as the remaining six incognito celebrities enter the competition, with Pufferfish, Bush, Wolf, Pegasus, Toad in the Hole and Bear taking to the stage. Special guest Vicky McClure joins the panellists.

programme.desc: The musical guessing game continues as Joel Dommett welcomes five of the incognito celebrity singers back to the stage. Jonathan Ross, Davina McCall, Maya Jama, Mo Gilligan and guest panellist Suranne Jones try to work out who they are.

programme.title: Law and Order
programme.desc: In an unruly world our ancient powers must lead their people, create ways to govern and keep rebellion at bay. Who will find the right way to rule?

programme.title: Liguria
programme.desc: Stanley Tucci visits one of the most famous and frequented regions of Italy, the Italian Riviera, for the glamour of Portofino and the stunning picture-perfect fishing villages of the Cinque Terre.

programme.title: Patterned Planet
programme.desc: Cameras in space capture natural spectacles on an epic scale.

programme.title: Episode 5
programme.desc: In Belize, Simon dives on a coral reef off, visits a rescue centre for orphaned manatees and witnesses a gun battle between armed park rangers and intruders from neighbouring Guatemala intent on clearing the rainforest for farming.

programme.title: Emptiness
programme.desc: British comedian and travel enthusiast Griff Rhys Jones explores the prairies and vast sprawling plains of both Saskatchewon and Alberta provinces and discovers they reveal riches from fossils to farmland.

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Paul departs from Tokyo and travels northward by bullet train, pausing to soak in the serene mountain springs of Unazuki Onsen, explore the shimmering gold leaf of Kanazawa and meet the master craftsmen keeping Wajima's lacquerware traditions alive.

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Paul explores the remote, thatched villages of Gokayama, through Niigata's rice paddies on a special sake train, to the washi paper mills of Echizen, and the ancient, spiritual waters of Lake Biwa.

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Rhod Gilbert presents a selection of some of the funniest and most dramatic moments from the series.

programme.title: Germany and Austria
programme.desc: Joanna's emotional exploration begins at the river's source, Germany's Black Forest mountains, ends at the Romanian/Ukrainian border, and marks two key anniversaries. The first is D-Day - the beginning of the end of World War Two and a brief era of freedom.

programme.title: Late Night Vision
