programme.title: We Meat Again
programme.desc: After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert - but magical - chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: A Hair-ifying Night
programme.desc: Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Follow the Lightning: Part 1
programme.desc: Tom and the riders go in search of Thunder and must face a gauntlet of dangerous dragons to find their lost friend. Along the way, Tom reveals his big secret to D’Angelo and Alex.

programme.title: Total Nightmare
programme.desc: When Hookfang is drawn to a female Monstrous Nightmare, Snotlout tries to break them up before he loses his friend forever.

programme.title: Alvin & the Outcasts
programme.desc: Alvin and the outcast Vikings terrorize Berk, left defenseless without their dragons, and now only Hiccup can bring them back.

programme.title: The Invincible Armour
programme.desc: Po and the Kids are put to the ultimate test, and must use all their knowledge and skills in order to defeat The White Bone Demon.

programme.title: Shadows of Bali
programme.desc: Odlulu uses the Shadow Puppet Key to create her own living shadows. When her mischievous shadows run off with the key, the Wanderers learn the only way to reattach the shadows is to touch them with the key. So, with the promise of a puppet show, they lure the shadows to the puppet theater, where they launch an epic game of tag to recapture the shadows before sunset

programme.title: King Juli-End
programme.desc: King Julien is mistakenly diagnosed with Mad Horse Disease, leading him to believe he's going to die - and Uncle King Julien to try to reclaim the throne.

programme.title: School Of Hard Rocks
programme.desc: When teamed up with her new friend Lerk, Eep's competitive side takes over when she sets out to win the first-ever school hunting exam at any cost.

programme.title: Lucky And The Price Of Freedom
programme.desc: Grayson wrangles Spirit "fair and square" and sends him to auction in another town --and there is nothing Lucky can do to stop him!

programme.title: Volcano
programme.desc: Ty and Revvit bravely stay behind to build and save their crater from a nearby volcano eruption, but D-Structsdoesn't want them to succeed

programme.title: The Black Paladin
programme.desc: Voltron charges toward Zarkon's massive ship. When Shiro loses control of the Black Lion, the team must figure out a new way to defeat the Galra.

programme.title: Turbo Does Laundry Part 1/Part 2
programme.desc: An exciting two-part episode of connected mini-stories following the crew that ends with Silent But Deadly and Thora deactivating a stink bomb.

programme.title: 137 Hours/Stalks On A Plane
programme.desc: Smoove ditches the crew and gets trapped in a clubhouse; the crew goes to ridiculous lengths to beat each other in a radio station contest.

programme.title: Itty Bitty Blossom
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a special plant called an Itty Bitty Blossom that goes from newborn to full-grown in one day. Gabby and Pandy have to take care of the whiny and fussy growing Itty Bitty Blossom and make sure it is in its permanent soil spot before it's fully grown.

programme.title: Dollhouse Store Day
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a coin purse with kitty coins, it's Store Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy help out at all the different stores (Cakey's Bakery, Baby Box's Craft Emporium, Kitty Fairy's Flower Shoppe) to earn kitty coins and save up for a melodicat at the Grand Opening of DJ Catnip’s Music Store!

programme.title: Lucky And The Unbreakable Spirit
programme.desc: A wild horse Spirit and a soontobe city girl Lucky become friends in a frontier town

programme.title: Lucky And The Treacherous Trail
programme.desc: When Lucky gets wind of an advanced trail ride she decides to become the best frontier girl anyone has ever seen.overnight

programme.title: Everest Returns
programme.desc: Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yi’s violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yi’s music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: Welcome Home, Everest!
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help.

programme.title: A New Bergen-Ning / Laugh Out Cloud
programme.desc: Poppy throws a party to urge the Trolls and Bergens to build friendship When Troll Village has a drought Cloud Guy offers to wash away the problem after some quality time with Branch.

programme.title: Two Party System / Fun Branch
programme.desc: Poppy discovers that Branch and Bridgets birthdays are on the same day and throws them both partiesBranch attempts to prove to the Snack Pack that he is fun.

programme.title: Spaceship
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a spaceship that takes off with a sleeping CatRat inside! Gabby, Pandy, and Kitty Fairy have to get the ship back into The Fairy Tail Garden before Floyd (who thinks it's the best kitty toy ever!) gets his paws on it!

programme.title: Gabby Gets The Hiccups
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures, but it isn't until CatRat scares the hiccups out of Gabby that they go away!

programme.title: Hamster Kitties
programme.desc: When 6 adorable hamster kitties get loose in the dollhouse, Gabby, Pandy and Baby Box head out to look for them. Along the way, Baby Box learns a lot about hamster kitties, which convinces Mama Box to let them live in the Craft Room.

programme.title: Kitty School
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a school notebook and lunch box, it's Kitty School Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy head to different classes held by the Gabby Cats to learn and live a day in the life of a student.

programme.title: Picture Perfect
programme.desc: Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Gruff Around The Edges
programme.desc: When a distant cousin of the Twins named Gruffnut arrives on Dragon's Edge, Tuffnut tries to impress him, but Gruffnut may not be the hero he seems.

programme.title: It Takes Ahhh Valley Part 1 & 2
programme.desc: When the Croods return to Ahhh! Valley they find that the evil Brood family has taken over and Grug must work with fellow Valleyites to defeat them

programme.title: CJ Wooferbug/What Did I Miss
programme.desc: DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJ’s birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: Fire Escape
programme.desc: Tom hatches an unorthodox plan to use a monstrous Nightmare to test Alex’s new fire suits that endangers the secret of dragons.

programme.title: Ride or Die
programme.desc: After a fight with her mom, Jun joins Tom on an adventure into the Fire Realm, where the knowledge of myths saves the day.

programme.title: Sticky Business
programme.desc: Struggling to find their purpose on the Betterman farm, the Croods see an opportunity to prove their worth by harvesting Phil’s perilous (and sticky) bounceberries.

programme.title: Guy Time
programme.desc: When Eep wants alone time with her new friend Dawn, Guy seeks a new friend of his own and finds an unlikely companion in Thunk.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon Master
programme.desc: After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Blue Dragon Plays with Fire
programme.desc: When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: Captain Underpants and The Frenzied Farts of Flabby Flabulous
programme.desc: George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: Captain Underpants and The Dreadful Debacle of DJ Drowsy Drawers
programme.desc: George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.title: Picture Perfect
programme.desc: Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Gruff Around The Edges
programme.desc: When a distant cousin of the Twins named Gruffnut arrives on Dragon's Edge, Tuffnut tries to impress him, but Gruffnut may not be the hero he seems.

programme.desc: When the Croods return to Ahhh! Valley they find that the evil Brood family has taken over and Grug must work with fellow Valleyites to defeat them

programme.title: Gabby Gets The Hiccups
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures, but it isn't until CatRat scares the hiccups out of Gabby that they go away!

programme.title: Please Hold for the Next Representative
programme.desc: Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they’ve solved one issue, another springs up - and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits’ end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing…

programme.title: Please Hold While We Connect You
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy.

programme.title: Everest Returns
programme.desc: Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yi’s violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yi’s music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: Dr. Catastrophe
programme.desc: During an attempt to get displaced Fire Gronckles back to their native Fire Realm, D’Angelo makes a mistake by accidentally feeding them Catastrophic Quaken eggs.

programme.title: It Flies in the Family
programme.desc: Eugene discovers the Lair and demands a dragon of his own.

programme.title: Magma Comes to the Surface
programme.desc: The dragon riders must sneak a very sick Magma Breather into the ICARIS infirmary.

programme.title: Wrinkles & Stickles
programme.desc: After Turtleneck is captured by Frederic Estes, Boss Baby and Tim attempt to rescue her, leading them to the terrifying "fun house" at the town fair

programme.title: Bossa Nova
programme.desc: After Boss Baby is fired from Baby Corp;he attempts to navigate regular baby life in a Mommy/Daddy/Baby playgroup. Even worse;the playgroup’s other new member is Mega Fat;whose animatronic stuffie Wagby malfunctions and threatens the safety of the whole group. Meanwhile;Tim does everything he can to avoid doing his homework.

programme.title: The Museum Job
programme.desc: When the crowded bathroom situation at the local museum threatens baby love;Boss Baby leads his new team of playgroup babies on their first mission…and then their SECOND mission after a klepto baby in their group swipes a priceless artifact. In a continued attempt to avoid homework;Tim joins Boss Baby on his mission.

programme.title: Picture Perfect
programme.desc: Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy.

Yi’s music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: Follow the Lightning: Part 2
programme.desc: Tom and the riders help Thunder, who is seeking revenge against the dragons that chased off his family.

programme.title: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 1
programme.desc: Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders discover a mysterious object filled with secrets during their search for Dagur the Deranged.

programme.title: How to Pick Your Dragon
programme.desc: Stoick wants to train his own dragon and enlists Hiccup to help him tame the most ferocious species yet.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon Master
programme.desc: After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Big in Japan
programme.desc: Wally and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Pineapple Of My Eye
programme.desc: Masikura tricks King Julien into believing that a pineapple contains all the souls and wisdom of the previous Julien Kings.

programme.title: Wet Hot Ahhh Valley Summer / Grug Vs The Moon
programme.desc: When Eep and Thunk challenge each other in the first-ever dare-off, Thunk faces the deep end - his greatest fear; Grug picks a fight with the moon.

programme.title: Lucky And The Unbreakable Spirit
programme.desc: A wild horse Spirit and a soontobe city girl Lucky become friends in a frontier town

programme.title: Ty And Revvit
programme.desc: Meet Ty Rux and his buddy Revvit as they join forces with the giant Dinotrux team that are half dinosaur, half construction truck and full-on fun!

programme.title: The New Alliance
programme.desc: A space explorer, previously thought lost in space, returns to Earth and joins four teenagers in a search for a giant alien robot lion

programme.title: Crazy Fast
programme.desc: Turbo must become a hero by saving the city from a menacing tiger beetle, who has challenged him to a race on an insane stunt-filled obstacle course.

programme.title: Dungball Derby/Ace Of Race
programme.desc: When White Shadow is invited to play a daring sport against his hero, an athletic dung beetle, the crew is worried he doesn't know the game is fixed. // Chet gets taken by a con artist gecko and bets Turbo's shell. When Turbo is challenged, he must go slow to try to beat the gecko at his own game.

programme.title: Kitty Fairy's Sleepover
programme.desc: When Gabby, Pandy and the Gabby Cats prepare for a sleepover in the Garden, they discover Pillow Cat has never been to a sleepover. They help her conquer her fears and enjoy her first sleepover.

programme.title: Let's Make A Movie!
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes two little containers of popcorn and two movie tickets, it’s movie night in the dollhouse! Demanding Director CatRat leads the Gabby Cats through a Gabby-fied version of a classic story, Gabby-locks and the Three Bears.

programme.title: Lucky And The Mysterious Map
programme.desc: During a camping trip Jim gives Lucky and the girls a treasure map that sends them on the adventure of a lifetime

programme.title: Lucky And The Competition Conundrum
programme.desc: When Lucky and Pru find themselves on opposing teams for a school fundraiser their competitive streaks emerge and their friendship is tested

programme.title: Sewer Koi and the Museum Heist
programme.desc: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he’s missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.title: Peng vs. Peng
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Royal Review / Funishment
programme.desc: Poppy faces her first royal review as Queen and sets out to ensure 100 happiness in Troll VillagePoppy must figure out how to handle crime in Troll Village when Cooper steals a pie.

programme.title: Bad News Bergens / Unhealthy Competition
programme.desc: Poppy signs the Trolls up for a game of Bergenball with the toughest Bergen team aroundSmidge and Guy Diamond face off in a competition for juice dominance.

programme.title: Kitty Cat Cam
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a new camera that takes pictures with silly filters, CatRat uses it to lead Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats on a photographic scavenger hunt around the dollhouse!

programme.title: Dollhouse Defenders
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes masks and capes for her and Pandy, they become the dollhouse defenders and must save the Gabby Cats from Bad Guy CatRat! In the Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song about her garden magic!

programme.title: Mixed-Up Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a snow globe shaped like the dollhouse, she notices the rooms inside are all cattywampus and in the wrong place. After a series of wacky misadventures that result in CatRat becoming a craft version of himself, Gabby figures out they need to fix the dollhouse globe to return everything back to normal.

programme.title: Game Show
programme.desc: It’s Game Show Day in the dollhouse! Our wily and well-groomed host, CatRat, leads Gabby and Pandy around the dollhouse, where they compete in Gab-ified games, like Tushy Tunes on the "butt xylophone" couch and a cooking competition of Bakey with Cakey. They win tickets and trade them in for prizes at the end.

programme.title: Picture Perfect
programme.desc: Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Gruff Around The Edges
programme.desc: When a distant cousin of the Twins named Gruffnut arrives on Dragon's Edge, Tuffnut tries to impress him, but Gruffnut may not be the hero he seems.

programme.title: It Takes Ahhh Valley Part 1 & 2
programme.desc: When the Croods return to Ahhh! Valley they find that the evil Brood family has taken over and Grug must work with fellow Valleyites to defeat them

programme.title: CJ Wooferbug/What Did I Miss
programme.desc: DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJ’s birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: Empty Fireworm Nest
programme.desc: When a tiny Fireworm dragon ends up at ICARIS, Alex has to decide between her moms’ excitement and keeping the dragon secret.

programme.title: Dr. Catastrophe
programme.desc: During an attempt to get displaced Fire Gronckles back to their native Fire Realm, D’Angelo makes a mistake by accidentally feeding them Catastrophic Quaken eggs.

programme.title: Game Nightmare
programme.desc: When the Bettermans invite the Croods to join their family game night, two things become clear: Phil needs to win and Grug hates to lose.

programme.title: What Goes Eep Must Come Dawn
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure - climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: Blade of the Red Phoenix
programme.desc: Po and the kids are recruited to perform in Mei Mei's theatrical show, but things take a turn when Jindiao ruins the play in order to find a mystical scroll

programme.title: The Intruder Flies a Crooked Path
programme.desc: When Jindiao arrives to the Village, he invites the kids to participate in an exhibition match, but has alternative motives

programme.title: Captain Underpants and The Horrible Hostilities of the Homework Hydra
programme.desc: When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire
programme.desc: When Erica makes fun of George and Harold’s latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: Picture Perfect
programme.desc: Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Gruff Around The Edges
programme.desc: When a distant cousin of the Twins named Gruffnut arrives on Dragon's Edge, Tuffnut tries to impress him, but Gruffnut may not be the hero he seems.

programme.title: It Takes Ahhh Valley Part 1 & 2
programme.desc: When the Croods return to Ahhh! Valley they find that the evil Brood family has taken over and Grug must work with fellow Valleyites to defeat them

What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: Hamster Kitties
programme.desc: When 6 adorable hamster kitties get loose in the dollhouse, Gabby, Pandy and Baby Box head out to look for them. Along the way, Baby Box learns a lot about hamster kitties, which convinces Mama Box to let them live in the Craft Room.

programme.title: Kitty School
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a school notebook and lunch box, it's Kitty School Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy head to different classes held by the Gabby Cats to learn and live a day in the life of a student.

programme.title: Welcome Home, Everest!
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help.

programme.title: Sewer Koi and the Museum Heist
programme.desc: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he’s missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.title: Peng vs. Peng
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: The Sky Torcher
programme.desc: The Sky Torcher & Flame Throwers invade the Crystal Realm. Tom must conquer his demons and bond with the Fault Ripper to defeat the Sky Torcher.

programme.title: First Flight: Part 1
programme.desc: Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.title: First Flight: Part 2
programme.desc: Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: Ga Ba Goo Ba Ga (The Babblist)
programme.desc: There’s a new "babblist" in town- someone who claims to understand baby talk. Boss Baby spots this fraud right away;and must debunk his tactics before he scams the playgroup parents. Meanwhile;Tim tries to sell magazines with Boss Baby’s help.

programme.title: The Coo Chi Coup
programme.desc: Boss Baby loves awards- and the Golden Rattle trophy is no exception. When presented with the chance to win an award at a company retreat;he must choose between his pride and his team.

programme.title: Lights, Camera, Org Chart!
programme.desc: Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. However when Bubbeezee photographer Travis Le Duque chooses anyone but Boss for his coverspread;the status quo is upended! Tim continues to fail his class assignment: a model solar system

programme.title: Un Metier Serieux
programme.desc: Summer is over. A new school year dawns at the middle school and Pierre, Meriem, Fouad, Sophie, Sandrine, Alix, and Sofiane, a dedicated and close-knit group of teachers, are reunited. They are joined by Benjamin, a young, inexperienced substitute teacher who is quickly confronted with the trials and tribulations of his job. Through their interactions, he comes to find that the passion for teaching is still alive and well within this fragile institution.

programme.title: Avant-Garde
programme.desc: 1984, the French-German border. A gallery owner from Berlin is carrying with him a flagship sculpture of his collection to present it in a major exhibition. But on seeing the object, the French customs officer is hesitant: is it really an artwork?

programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: The storm
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: A room for Grandma and Grandpa
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: The crazy barbecue
programme.desc: Four best friends have a secret: after school, they climb up to their hidden tree house. It contains a priceless treasure: books! Each day, the children tell one another stories, travelling to exciting fairy-tale worlds.

programme.title: The lucky star
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Plankton's Secret
programme.desc: 95% of the planet Terraqua is covered by its oceans. Corto, Arthus, Enki and Mouse make up the Tikis, a team from the idyllic archipelago of Nui. They have the firm intention of winning the ''Whale Cup'', the biggest drone race ever.

programme.title: Panic on Board
programme.desc: Api explains to Koro that she has discovered proof of Laeti's involvement in eric's accident. Unfortunately, Mouss overhears their conversation.

programme.title: A very special birthday
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: Indiscretions and dragons
programme.desc: Flavie leaks a secret: she reveals that Zoe has stuffed her bra. Felix plays an intense game of Dungeons and Dragons with his friends and his mother.

programme.title: Cheating is bad
programme.desc: Tamia is a courageous young girl who does nothing without careful thought. She wants to be a mediator between parents and their children, a voice for those without one. Helped by friends Audrey, Sara, Yao and Cheick, she enjoys plenty of adventures, taking her young audience on a veritable journey.

programme.title: Magazine
programme.desc: TV5MONDE, the global French language network, offers the best television programmes from France, Belgium, Switzerland and Canada.

programme.title: Victoire in Houlgate
programme.desc: Victoire, 10 years old, has cystic fibrosis. Passionate about classical dance, she also loves animals. In Houlgate, Clemence Castel takes the young girl to the zoo, to a shelter, and finally to meet one of her idols: the prima ballerina Marie-Agnes Gillot.

programme.title: The secrets of the world's narrowest skyscraper
programme.desc: It's only three years old and already an icon! The Steinway Tower in New York is the world's narrowest skyscraper. Located just a stone's throw from Central Park, it has 84 floors. Why the race for the most innovative tower? We pay a visit.

programme.title: A garden of diversity
programme.desc: In Oeschenbach, in the canton of Berne, 20 year-old Gabriel Hess, took over the garden behind his parents' house. He learned to garden whilst still at school. In addition to the rare and old varieties he propagates with care to ensure they are never lost, he also collects pelargoniums.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote d'Azur.

programme.title: Chef Pays
programme.desc: Cooking is a way of building bridges between countries and sharing cultural diversity. Starting with a typical ingredient from the French overseas departments and territories, the chef creates a unique dish.

programme.title: Marie-Dolores Mabuila (Democratic Republic of Congo)
programme.desc: After arriving in Brussels at the age of 2 with her family, Marie-Dolores Mabuila is now part of the Belgian federal police, where she confronts day-to-day racism. But this hasn't stopped her from working her way up the ladder and even winning the prestigious International Women's Leadership Award.

programme.title: Christophe Ribero
programme.desc: It's one of the biggest tennis tournaments for players aged 18 and under: a look back at the history of the Beaulieu-sur-Mer ITF tournament with its director, Christophe Ribero.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Menton, celebrating lemons
programme.desc: Carinne Teyssandier travels to Menton for a festive, gourmet programme paying tribute to lemons, the sun-drenched citrus fruit that has been celebrated there since 1934.

programme.title: Hep Taxi !

programme.title: Les Maitres Des Algues
programme.desc: Kombu, dulse, wakame, gamtae: interest in seaweed is flourishing and its diversity continues to surprise the palate. Sought-after for its nutritional value, salty tang or aesthetic properties, it is gradually conquering the world. We discover the fascinating world of seaweed, from Japan to South Korea and Brittany.

programme.title: Les Enfants Des Justes
programme.desc: Dordogne, 1942. Virgile and Blanche's farm is near the demarcation line, with Virgile always happy to help those wanting to cross into the free zone. Childless, the couple take in Sarah and Simon, two Jewish youngsters. Unbreakable bonds are gradually forged between them, despite all the checks and the denunciations....

programme.title: The 1920s: the great scientific leap forward!
programme.desc: In the early 1920s, the visionaries Leo Pariseau, Jacques Rousseau and particularly Brother Marie-Victorin, debated the foundation of the Acfas, based on the model of American and British scientific societies. The aim: to lay the foundations of a strong scientific culture for francophone Canada.

programme.title: Charentes by van

programme.title: The honey harvest
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Saving Canopee the comforter
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: Jealousy
programme.desc: Four best friends have a secret: after school, they climb up to their hidden tree house. It contains a priceless treasure: books! Each day, the children tell one another stories, travelling to exciting fairy-tale worlds.

programme.title: Against bad dreams
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: The Tortulibris Race
programme.desc: 95% of the planet Terraqua is covered by its oceans. Corto, Arthus, Enki and Mouse make up the Tikis, a team from the idyllic archipelago of Nui. They have the firm intention of winning the ''Whale Cup'', the biggest drone race ever.

programme.title: The Final Blow
programme.desc: The teacher asks Mouss for advice, since he is the delegate. Could he encourage Api? But Mouss, seeking revenge, lies by saying that Api is a cheater.

programme.title: A bottle for a bat
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: Pot luck
programme.desc: Cindy and Vic scheme to try to meet the boy they're interested in, but Simon guesses what they're up to. Flavie, Zoe and Pierre-Charles want to shine at the science exhibition.

programme.title: Cheick's secret garden
programme.desc: Tamia is a courageous young girl who does nothing without careful thought. She wants to be a mediator between parents and their children, a voice for those without one. Helped by friends Audrey, Sara, Yao and Cheick, she enjoys plenty of adventures, taking her young audience on a veritable journey.

In this French-speaking country, French is neither an official language nor a dead one, but a living language of expression, creation, and transmission.

programme.title: Maroc, La Route De La Musique
programme.desc: Music is every where in Morocco. From Rabat to Essaouira, via Fez, Meknes, Marrakesh and the gateways to the desert, we go on a voyage of discovery of the great imperial cities, the souks, the Amazigh, Saharan, Gnaoui and Andalusian musicians... Each stage highlights the multiple influences that run through the Cherifian kingdom.

programme.title: Day 5 Afternoon Session (Table 2): R1-13 (Luca Brecel vs Ryan Day)
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.

programme.title: Schneider Electric Marathon de Paris
programme.desc: The Paris Marathon is an annual marathon hosted by the city of Paris, France. It is the largest running event in France in terms of finishers and is typically among the five largest marathons in the world.[2] The marathon begins along the Champs-Élysées, runs southeast through the city to the Bois de Vincennes, heads back through the city along the River Seine, and finishes on Avenue Foch.

programme.title: Day 6 Afternoon Session (Table 2): R1-13 (Final) (Luca Brecel vs Ryan Day)

programme.title: Endurance Swimrun - One Water Race
programme.desc: The One Water Race is a professional race and created for the absolute best endurance racers in the world. The race distance is about 250 km, a distance of 6 marathons, split up into approximately 200 km running and 50 km swimming. Running takes place on all types of terrain, rocks, cliffs, gravel roads, paths but mostly unpaved and difficult terrain. Swimming is in open sea and can often feature strong winds, currents and waves.

programme.title: Episode 4 (Eng Subtitles)

programme.title: Episode 7: Cadence - Theatre Cafe
programme.desc: 10-year-old Cadence is a multi-talented performer. She simply loves the stage! programme.title: (PG) Episode 1 - Congo (Eng Subtitles)
programme.desc: Adventurer Simon Reeve journeys deep into the heart of some of Earth's last great wildernesses. On our increasingly crowded planet there are still a few remote areas where nature has the upper hand: the last great wildernesses. In this series Simon Reeve ventures further into the unknown than he ever has before, to unlock its secrets and experience nature at its most beautiful and fragile.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 4
programme.desc: Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released. This show is a sci-fi, cowboy, world-destruction, action-combo that will literally blow your mind!

For thousands of years, man has lived united with this land and the nature that surrounds it.

programme.title: (PG) (CN/Eng Subtitles)

programme.title: Coroner's Diary
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Qin Wan (Landy Li), the daughter of the minister of Dali Temple, relied on her superb medical and forensic skills to join hands with Prince Yan Chi (Ao Rui Peng) to solve unsolved cases and find the real culprit in order to vindicate her father.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: The Longest Day in Chang'an
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] As the city of Chang'an faces a major crisis during the eve of Lantern Festival, death row prisoner Zhang Xiaojing (Lei Jia Yin) is given a critical mission to save the city of Chang'an together with Li Bi (Jackson Yee) within twelve hours.

programme.title: The Longest Day in Chang'an
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] As the city of Chang'an faces a major crisis during the eve of Lantern Festival, death row prisoner Zhang Xiaojing (Lei Jia Yin) is given a critical mission to save the city of Chang'an together with Li Bi (Jackson Yee) within twelve hours.

programme.title: The Long River
programme.desc: After a huge flood during the 15th year of his reign, the young Emperor Kang Xi conducts civil service examinations to recruit talented individuals to solve the problems plaguing the Yellow River, allowing the 24-year-old Chen Huang an opportunity to come to the fore.

programme.title: The Ingenious One
programme.desc: In the process of traversing the rivers and lakes after ten years of training, Yun Xiang (Chen Xiao) met Shu Yanan (Rachel Momo), a weird and intelligent woman and several others and gradually realized the warmth of friendship.

programme.title: Love Virtually
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Ye Shan's marriage hits the 7-year itch. He accidentally downloads a virtual lover app and begins dating 'F'. Surprisingly, his wife is calm in the face of his "infidelity," and the trio begin a bizarre life under one roof.

programme.title: Family By Choice
programme.desc: Three unrelated individuals - Jin Sanha (Hwang In Yeop), Yoon Joowan (Jung Chae Yeon), and Kang Haijoon (Bae Hyun Sung) - become family for each other due to changes in their respective families. Ten years later, the trio reunite, kicking off a youthful romance.

programme.title: Our Generation

programme.title: Asia's "Double Global Warming"
programme.desc: After a record hot summer in 2024, the WMO has placed a focus upon Asia where warming progresses at double the rate of the rest of the world - specialists weigh in on potential countermeasures.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
programme.desc: Drama unfolds just off the Japanese coast when male Asian sheephead wrasse battle for supremacy. Sporting huge forehead humps and massive jaws, they meet mouth to mouth... and not out of affection!

programme.title: Time-Lapse Journey
programme.desc: Mount Fuji, the tallest mountain in Japan, has many faces - see the beauty of these different Fujis through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: Fit with the Doctor's Cyborg
programme.desc: Come and learn 'Pro Tips' and 'Improvement Points' that will help you properly kick off and move your body through the air.

programme.title: Design Ah Neo
programme.desc: Uniforms: Design is fun - design feels good! Cutting-edge images and music guide children to enjoy exploring the ideas and tweaks in the designs all around us.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: A reconstructive surgeon restores injured body parts via unprecedented supermicrosurgery transfers and helps patients who were told they were untreatable - hailed a genius, he connects people to hope.

programme.title: Dining with the Chef mini
programme.desc: Featured recipe: Rice Gratin with White Miso Sauce. Learn about easy, delicious, and healthy cooking with Chef Rika in five minutes!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Talk It Out: A Japan-Korea Forum
programme.desc: The young participants of a long-running Japan-South Korea students forum get along even if bilateral ties have sometimes been on choppy waters - we follow the latest gathering in Sapporo.

programme.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
programme.desc: Large-Scale Blackouts: A large-scale blackout is the total loss of power in an entire region - Hokkaido's 2018 blackout had a major impact on medical care and logistics. Find out to prevent one here.

programme.title: Carving the Spirit of Fishermen
programme.desc: Hokkaido / Takeya Takayuki (Model Maker): Fishing boats in the herring industry that thrived here until the 1950s featured swirling decorations that made a big impression on Hokkaido native Takeya.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Trails to Oishii Tokyo mini
programme.desc: Our focus this time is wasabi. Visit a culturally significant paddy field, try a unique grater that offers stronger pungency, and learn more about the cultivation history of Japan's fiery root.

programme.title: The Seasons of Yamato
programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with pianist Mine Kawakami - for which she plays exclusive pieces - helps you experience each season.

programme.title: Ukiyo-e Edo-Life
programme.desc: Doodles or Ukiyo-e: A series of doodles by famous artist Utagawa Kuniyoshi turn out to be carefully considered depictions of the kabuki actors of the day; what kind of statement was he trying to make?

programme.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan presents a sumo highlights programme for fans around the globe featuring all top-division bouts from Day 14 of the latest Grand Sumo tournament in Tokyo.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.desc: The documentary captures the daily work of pediatricians and healthcare staff in major departments of Shenzhen Children's Hospital, including emergency pediatrics, cardiothoracic surgery, intensive care, neurosurgery, urology, orthopedics, endocrinology, and hematology oncology. programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW
programme.desc: Six Premier League Titles, Four League Cups, Two FA Cups, a Champions League medal and 96 caps for England. Few players can boast a footballing CV like Kyle Walker. programme.title: Isn't It Romantic
programme.desc: Fearful of leaving ALF alone, Kate and Willie have been going out separately, which ALF takes as a sign of a troubled marriage. ALF enlists the help of the kids to give Kate and Willie a second honeymoon.

programme.title: Hail to the Chief
programme.desc: When ALF continually disrupts Kate's sleep to ask about the American political process, Kate gives ALF a civics lesson and then dreams that they are opponents in the Presidential election.

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: When the Ochmoneks' nephew Jake, a belligerent boy who has trouble communicating with anyone, comes to stay with them, they ask the Tanners for help in raising him. ALF discovers Jake's hidden talent.

programme.title: The Adventure of the Egyptian Tomb
programme.desc: After opening an ancient Egyptian tomb, members of an English-American museum expedition start dropping off like flies. Can it truly be the Pharaoh's curse? Poirot travels to Egypt to unravel the mystery.

programme.title: The Underdog
programme.desc: Poirot investigates when the cruel CEO of a chemical company is bludgeoned to death in his home after the company's formula for a revolutionary new synthetic rubber is targeted by a thief.

programme.title: The Crane
programme.desc: After rescuing a prisoner from execution by a dictator, the IMF has to find a hiding place so conspicuous it will be overlooked by police hunting the fugitive.

programme.title: Death Squad
programme.desc: Jim Phelps leads the IMF to aid one of its own members when Barney is arrested and marked for execution by a sadistic police chief.

programme.title: The Martyr
programme.desc: To keep a student congress from being used as a rubber stamp by a repressive premier, the IMF sets Phelps up for capture so he can betray Paris as a turncoat student leader.

programme.title: The American Dream
programme.desc: Hawke comes to the aid of an old war buddy whose family and friends are being victimised by a former Vietnamese warlord.

programme.title: Inn at the End of The Road
programme.desc: Hawke and Santini must find a newly developed electronic device which was stolen by a group international thieves. With Airwolf they begin a perilous search to locate it before irreparable damage is done.

programme.title: Santini's Millions
programme.desc: When Dominic is flying Airwolf alone on a mission, he lands the helicopter to rescue a downed pilot and stands to inherit millions.

programme.title: A Gazebo Never Forgets
programme.desc: Samantha tells Aunt Clara she plans to get a bank loan in order to tear down the gazebo and build a rumpus room. At the park, Tabitha fancies another baby's toy elephant and twitches it over.

programme.title: Soap Box Derby
programme.desc: Samantha helps twelve year old Johnny Mills get his Soap Box Derby Racer to the practice area. Gladys Kravitz boasts that her nephew will sweep the local contests and go on to win the finals at Akron.

programme.title: Sam in the Moon
programme.desc: Darrin asks Samantha to join him in watching moon pictures on TV, but she replies she's already been there. Then Endora takes Samantha shopping in Tokyo.

programme.title: Ho Ho the Clown
programme.desc: Darrin is fired when Tabitha wins all the pries on a TV show.

programme.title: Retri
programme.desc: The SVU find themselves in unfamiliar territory when Doctor Raye Massey calls them in to investigate the case of a baby infected with AIDS. They discover that the baby had been prescribed ineffective vitamins by a doctor who runs a 'voodoo' medical practi

programme.title: Babes
programme.desc: When a boy is lit on fire, the SVU investigates the malicious crime. Their investigation leads to one man to admit to hurting the victim and opens a new door for the detectives when he unveils a group of pregnant teenage girls.

programme.title: The Announcement
programme.desc: Jenny reveals to her parents that she is pregnant. However, George and Louise are initially upset because they discover that Jenny chose not to tell them.

programme.title: A Short Story
programme.desc: George is chosen "Small-Business Man of the Year."

programme.title: Louise's Old Boyfriend
programme.desc: Florence decides to impersonate Louise and the result is a three-ring circus. While Louise lingers, uncertain about keeping a 35-year-old date with her first boyfriend, Florence seizes the chance to be Mrs Jefferson and keeps it herself.

programme.title: Now You See It, Now You Don't: Part 1
programme.desc: While using Mr. Bentley's telescope on Halloween, Louise thinks she witnesses a murder.

programme.title: Now You See It, Now You Don't: Part 2
programme.desc: Pursuing her feeling that she may have witnessed a murder, Louise lands in deep trouble.

programme.title: Grave Danger (Part 1)
programme.desc: The CSI teams come together to save one of their own when they learn one team member has been kidnapped and buried alive, and now they must find him before he suffocates under 5 feet of dirt.

programme.title: Grave Danger (Part 2)
programme.desc: The CSI teams come together to save one of their own when they learn one team member has been kidnapped and buried alive, and now they must find him before he suffocates under 5 feet of dirt.

programme.desc: Frasier suspects that his gorgeous new girlfriend is just using him to get free psychiatric advice.

programme.desc: Accused of breaking the Ochmoneks' window, ALF is put on trial by the Tanners. Certain he can defend himself and avoid the penalty of no TV privileges for a month, ALF agrees to participate in the proceeding.

programme.desc: When Uncle Albert dies of a heart attack upon discovering ALF in the backyard, ALF fears he may have scared the man to death. The Tanners soon learn about the unique Melmacian way of death and its rituals.

programme.title: The Yellow Iris
programme.desc: A man celebrates the two-year anniversary of his wife's sudden death by cyanide while in Argentina - a death which Poirot himself had witnessed, but could not solve at the time.

programme.title: The Case of the Missing Will
programme.desc: A terminally ill man asks Poirot to be executor of his new will but is murdered before he can write it, and it is later discovered the old will has been stolen.

programme.desc: Offering superior technology, the Visitors hide an evil beneath their alien faces. Earth's only hope rests with a small band of humans who are united in their effort to save the planet.

programme.title: Freedom Travelers

programme.title: Time Concert 3

programme.desc: Twenty years after a tragic mission left scars and secrets, Inspector Tam and Madam Fong return to Macau with a new generation of Special Female Force team. But when a familiar face from the past resurfaces during a high-risk escort mission, history threatens to repeat itself.

programme.title: Hello, Saturday
programme.desc: Helmed by the ever-popular veteran show host He Jiong, this all-new variety show features celebrity artistes from China, Hong Kong and Taiwan participating in song and dance performances, games and more.

programme.title: Chinese Restaurant 9
programme.desc: Making its debut in Africa, this season the program sets off from Tangier, Morocco, an iconic hub along the Maritime Silk Road. Through Chinese cuisine, it bridges China-Africa cultures and reimagines traditional dining with a modern twist. Get ready for a vibrant summer culinary journey across Asia and Africa.

programme.desc: During the reign of Long Hua, Xiao Duo, a powerful eunuch in charge of the imperial court, plans a palace mutiny with the help of a tribute lady Bu Yinlou. What is the fate between the two?

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go
programme.desc: This large-scale variety show gathers showbiz entertainers to challenge each other in various hilarious educational games. Viewers at home are also encouraged to get in on the fun and try out the games with friends in real life!

programme.title: Extraordinary Mission
programme.desc: Police officer Lin Kai receives an assignment to infiltrate a drug cartel called Twin Eagles. His operation starts to spiral out of control when he slowly but unwillingly becomes an addict while trying to gain the leader's trust.

programme.title: The Pride of Hunan Cuisine 2
programme.desc: Get your taste buds ready to discover temptations in the form of great food in Hunan cuisine. Your appetite will be stimulated through the exploration of distinctive cooking techniques and the use of ingredients in Hunan cuisine.

programme.title: Everlasting Regret
programme.desc: Adapted from an award-winning Chinese novel, the story follows the life of a legendary Shanghai beauty Wang Qi Yao from her glamorous to her simpler days. She stays true to her own way of life while surviving the constant betrayal of her men, and bears witness to the waves of change to her city from 1947 to 1981.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the "Gang of Five" in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Justice, My Foot!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays Sung, a lawyer who uses any means necessary to help his wealthy clients escape the law. Sung retires to the countryside when urged by his wife, but when Mrs Sung encounters a woman whose husband's death has been covered up by corrupted officials, Sung returns to the court for justice to be served.

programme.title: Behind the Yellow Line
programme.desc: A fresh graduate, Paul, strikes up an acquaintance with a pretty young girl, Monica, on the metro. Monica is involved in a love affair with a married man while Paul is also pursued by a rich girl. When Paul vows his true love for Monica, she suggests playing hide-and-seek with him in the metro to decide if they are fated to be together.

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair
programme.desc: As Wudang disciple Zhuo Yi Hang confronts the Demon Palace, he reunites with Lian Ni Shang, the woman who once saved him, and their love reignites. Lian, a disciple of the Demon Palace, endures torment to be with Zhuo but is shattered when he accidentally injures her. A fierce battle between good and evil unfolds!

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision...

programme.title: Mother VS Mother
programme.desc: Guan De Xing fell in love with Li Xiao Yun when he was young, but was opposed by his mother and had to marry Zhou Shen Yu. Since then, Li holds a grudge against Zhou. Unfortunately, the son of Guan and Zhou falls in love with Li's daughter, and as the two mothers meet, they start brawling again!

programme.title: Shark Busters
programme.desc: During the financial crisis, a vast majority of Hong Kong people experience difficulties in repaying debts. During this time, loan sharks use ruthless ways to force debtors to repay their loans and it is up to Officer Lee and his underground team to hunt down the head of this illegal organization.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Ma Wing Jing and his brother arrive in Shanghai to make their fortune. Befriending a powerful mobster Tam, Ma is given his nightclub when he saves Tam's life. Ma's fortune rises but he must overcome the corruption and violence to survive.

programme.title: Hong Kong Hong Kong
programme.desc: After moving to Hong Kong, illegal immigrant Mang has no choice but to live in cramped quarters with male migrants who abuse her. In order to attain Hong Kong residency and a better life, she agrees to marry a lonely old carpenter. After her marriage, Mang crosses paths again with her ex-lover, and the two develop a passionate affair...

programme.title: The Truth
programme.desc: Orphaned lawyer Raymond Lau once helped clear hooker Lan of murder charges, not knowing that Lan is his mother. When a corrupt cop blackmails Lan with Raymond's identity, she kills him out of desperation. When Raymond is enlisted again to defend Lan, he uncovers the secret that she has been hiding about their relationship for years.

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddy's lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: Prince Charming
programme.desc: Chen Li Pin, the nerdy son of a business tycoon, and his friend seek love in Hawaii. Returning home in disappointment, they accidentally find themselves in a messy identity swap. It is at this time that Chen falls for a beautiful girl May, who thinks he is a company chauffeur...

programme.title: Ninth Happiness
programme.desc: A comedy starring many popular movie stars, this is a story about a magistrate and his brothers aiming to introduce sin and romance into the virtuous community of Rainbow Village. As they vie for the affections of a charming young village maiden, conflicts arise, adding a twist to their mischievous endeavours.

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Hong Kong tycoon Ren Da Kuan takes care of his family that spans four generations, yet his three sons grapple with their own challenges. Everything changes when his daughter returns from studying in France with her friend Roberto. Roberto brings a wave of transformation to the Ren family, sparking new hope and opportunities for all.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well (Extended Version)
programme.desc: In this beloved Hong Kong comedy, the three Chang brothers living with their parents learn that love blossoms with nurture, but withers when taken for granted through haste, deceit, and selfishness. This extended version features an additional shootout scene that was omitted from the original theatrical release during Lunar New Year 2016.

programme.title: Hong Kong Playboys
programme.desc: Sheng is a rich playboy who lives a carefree and fun life with the ladies, until his mother decides that he should get married. Up against other lady killers in his quest to find Miss Right, Sheng must decide what he wants.

programme.title: Face to Face
programme.desc: Tamotsu dies in a skiing accident and his roommate Yoshio marries his wife as well as inherits his entire fortune. At Tamotsu's funeral, Yoshio sees a badly disfigured old man and that is only the beginning of an evil downfall for him...

programme.title: Dream Lover
programme.desc: Ka Shing meets Kitty one day and they fall quickly in love. However, Kitty disappears shortly and when they meet years later, she is already married. To comfort himself, Ka Shing asks a mystic master to let Kitty appear in his dreams so that he can be with her constantly, even though she can only be his dream lover...

programme.title: The Truth: Final Episode
programme.desc: Raymond's lawyer licence is suspended as he has prevented the course of justice to clear his mother's conviction. He is subsequently framed for murder with every piece of evidence pointing towards him. The only one with proof of his innocence is his dying mother, who fights to stay alive long enough to exonerate her son before it is too late.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong's toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: The Myth
programme.desc: An archaeologist Jack, and a scientist William, stumble upon ancient Qin Dynasty artifacts that lead them to the mausoleum and mysteriously connects Jack to his past life as a warrior in ancient China, starting their mythical journey.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: God of Gambler's Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jin's pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wife's death.

programme.title: Ip Man- The Final Fight
programme.desc: The movie portrays the later life of grandmaster Ip Man in Hong Kong, including his romantic relationship with a singer after his wife died, much to his students' opposition; his relationship with his eldest son who is also his student; and finally, his reunion with disciple Bruce Lee after the latter becomes an international superstar.

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Li's path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: Accidental Confession
programme.desc: A love triangle at the University of Florida results in the murder of a popular student. An undeniable digital trail leads straight to his murderer.

programme.title: Killed For The Cash
programme.desc: When a Texas gas store owner, Subir Chatterjee, 58, is shot inside his cheque-cashing booth in 2002, detectives suspect his killer is someone Subir knew.

programme.title: Bound By Tragedy - Amber Dubois & Chelsea King
programme.desc: In February 2009, 14-year-old Amber Dubois vanishes while walking to school. A year later, detectives are no closer to finding Amber when 17-year-old Chelsea King disappears while jogging.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Murder
programme.desc: In the shadow of the Rockies, Carolyn Jansen, 43, is found dead, stuffed into a duct-taped container. Detectives have two suspects but no clear way to tell who is the killer.

programme.title: OMG Caught On Camera
programme.desc: Two friends emerge uninjured after being hit by a car - could this be the work of guardian angels? Nine skydivers miraculously survive after their planes collide over Wisconsin.

programme.title: Kelsey Smith
programme.desc: Kelsey's family knew something was amiss when their usually responsible and responsive daughter didn't respond to their texts while out running an errand.

programme.title: Kamryn Johnson
programme.desc: 9-year-old Kamryn Johnson is supposed to be at gymnastics class when her mother, Sheraton, receives a frantic phone call saying Kamryn is being held captive for ransom.

programme.title: Small Towns, Big Crimes
programme.desc: Undercover agents Lyle Kirian and Brian Townsend embed themselves in two different but equally dangerous worlds in order to investigate suspected local gang members and the Mexican cartel.

programme.title: Peace Love And Murder In Marin
programme.desc: A brutal double murder shocks Northern California's peace-loving and laid-back Marin County. With residents reeling, police chase an elusive killer through three counties.

programme.desc: In 1998, a fire in Sandi Nieves' home that started under suspicious circumstances led to her conviction for arson, the murders of her four daughters, and the attempted murder of her son David.

programme.desc: A couple is shot to death on their doorstep, and detectives have to track down the killer. In Louisville, a hearing-impaired man is stabbed in his doorway. And a woman's body is found in a trash can.

programme.title: Pay Me For My Name
programme.desc: A woman alerts police to a crime she's committing; a golf game leads one player to see red on the green; a man wants to get paid by police during a traffic stop; and more!
A murderous gang member starts a courtroom melee; a hit-and-run suspect tries to run from court; a murder suspect's mom screams at a judge; and more.

programme.title: Backslide
programme.desc: When a father of two is shot dead while driving, detectives must retrace his steps to figure out who killed him.

programme.title: Vengeful Shooter Or Protective Father?
programme.desc: A 68-year-old father shoots his daughter's boyfriend when the couple arrives at the family home. Believing his daughter is trapped in an abusive relationship, he fires three shots.

programme.title: Cold Ashes
programme.desc: A deadly house fire claims the life of a family, investigators suspect foul play, and it sends a mother on a decades-long crusade to find out what happened to her missing teenage daughter and best friend.

programme.desc: Gwinnett County Homicide investigates a parking lot brawl that leaves two young men shot dead, and could cost four others their lives in prison - though three of them never fired a shot.

programme.title: Truly Lost

programme.title: Backslide

programme.title: Boston's Little Girl Lost

programme.title: Dead Wrong

programme.title: Killed For The Cash

programme.title: The Garden City Butcher
