programme.desc: Celebrating classic and contemporary Cantonese pop music, each episode of this show features well-known singers and guests who perform live renditions of beloved hits and share behind-the-scenes stories from their musical journeys.

programme.title: Roadside Station Guide XIII
programme.desc: Wong You Nam and Chloe Leung take you to explore 13 roadside stations in the Kanto region of Japan, featuring local specialties, culture and scenic spots. Embark on an immersive journey through unique travel experiences at these popular rest stops along Japanese highways.

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: A round-up of the news before the day ends.

programme.title: Vital Lifeline
programme.desc: The body of the urban dweller is prone to problems. Vital Lifeline deconstructs your health. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of various diseases, as well as physical therapists and sports therapists to teach appropriate exercises.

programme.title: Friendaversary Adventure / Swiper's Birthday Surprise
programme.desc: Boots and Dora journey to Banana Hill to bring Isa a Friendiversary gift - a flowerpot that Boots painted himself! // Dora and friends throw Swiper a surprise birthday party. On the way to the party, Swiper attempts to swipe his own surprise present.

programme.title: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean
programme.desc: Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Gasquatch
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are deep in the woods when they discover and befriend a mud-loving monster truck named Gasquatch. Now, they must set out on an epic adventure to bring their new friend to Mud Fest... the muddiest party of all time.

programme.title: Truck Rangers
programme.desc: Blaze and his friends have joined the Truck Rangers, a scouting club where trucks earn badges for their accomplishments. But when Crusher's selfish scouting lands everyone in a heap of trouble, Blaze must race to the rescue!

programme.title: Rocky Saves Himself / Pups and the Mystery of the Driverless Snocat
programme.desc: Rocky must rescue himself when he has been stranded on an Island full of trash by Humdinger. // Daring Danny's new remote control accidentally takes control of Everest's SnoCat and all the vehicles in Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Pups Save a Cuckoo Clock / Pups Save Ms. Marjorie's House
programme.desc: Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: Pups Save a Show Jumper
programme.desc: Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel
programme.desc: The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road
programme.desc: The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: Rainforest Race / Bok Bok Birthday
programme.desc: Dora and Boots race their boxcar against Croc Racers in the Rainforest Race. / Dora and Boots secretly hand out Big Red Chicken's birthday invites to all their friends in time for his birthday party.

programme.title: The Power Swap / Shore Square
programme.desc: After Vigo zaps Fishy Force with his Power Stealing Ray, everyfishy's superpowers get swapped! // Penny Piranha makes up new rules so she never loses at shore shore.

programme.title: Ice Ice Vola / Do or Diary
programme.desc: Vola trains to become an amazing hockey player in just one day. // Chucks tries to learn everything he can about teen fishies to get closer to his stepsister, Maddie.

programme.title: My Birthday Party
programme.desc: It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Daddy's Movie Camera
programme.desc: Daddy gets a new video camera. First, Peppa shows him how to work it, and then he records Peppa being silly.

programme.title: School Play
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Polly's Holiday
programme.desc: Granny and Grandpa's pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Windy Autumn Day
programme.desc: It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppa's ball blows into the pond and George's hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Mysteries
programme.desc: The family is watching "Detective Potato" on TV. Peppa and George want to be detectives too. So,Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George use a magnifying glass to follow a trail of cake crumbs to solve the mystery

programme.title: Bubbles
programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water. Then he makes a big, muddy, bubbly puddle for everyone to jump up and down in.

programme.title: Bedtime
programme.desc: It's nearly time for bed and Peppa and George are called in for their bath. After that, they brush their teeth and get into bed. Soon they are fast asleep. Mummy and Daddy Pig finally sit down, but it's been a long day and they are very sleepy too.

programme.title: Princess For A Day / Barbabeau's Adventure
programme.desc: Barbabelle proudly announces to her family that she wants to become a princess. // Barbabravo is moping with boredom, his brothers and sisters are all busy and no one wants to play with him.

programme.title: Summer Camp I / Summer Camp II
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama have announced to their dear barbababies that they are going on a trip to Easter Island. // The Barbababies, the twins, and Mr. Strict set sail on "Thesee", a magnificent sailboat.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day
programme.desc: Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof
programme.desc: After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: Pups Save the Chicken Conductor / Pups Save the Digi-Tal Stylists
programme.desc: Chickaletta is left driving the train after an enormous chicken floaty launches Ed out the window. // Digi & Tal volunteer at the Pet Parlor. But when they run out of pets to pamper.

programme.title: Pups Save Fogstock/ Pups Save the Stage Actor
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger's music festival shakes up Adventure Bay and causes a big mess. // Francois is kicking off a touring production of his play but he is accidentally transported into the woods, and comes face to face with REAL mountain lions.

programme.title: Watch Out For Barbabright / If I Were A Billionaire
programme.desc: The twins visit Barbabright's room. // If I were a billionaire, what would I do to achieve my dreams?

programme.title: The Louvre / Opposite Day
programme.desc: On a trip to Paris, the Barbapapa family will discover the most incredible museum: the Louvre! // Barbalala has decided to respect all the rules of the day of opposites.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Roller Coaster/The Crew Builds Motor A Play Space
programme.desc: When Speed Meister's rollercoaster sends a pet playdate out of control, Rubble & Crew save the day with a bigger, better, and safer coaster. // The Bark Yard safety inspection is today! But will Motor go boom and cost the Crew a gold safety star?

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Train Station / The Crew Builds A Sierra Sparkle Sign
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew build the first train station in Builder Cove just in time to welcome Farmer Zoe's new cow Mooreen. // Popstar Sierra Sparkle is moving to Builder Cove! But when the pups plan a surprise greeting, Speed Meister makes a plan of his own.

programme.title: The Great Abuela Cookoff / Missing Map
programme.desc: After the Pokey Pigeons eat all of Abuela's elotes, Dora and Boots set out to find more ingredients for the Great Abuela Cook-off. / Dora, Boots and Backpack play an adventurous game of Hide-and-Seek to find Map.

programme.title: Mission to Mars
programme.desc: NASA's Commander Megan is back! And she's taking Blaze and his friends to... Mars! But when Crusher accidently detaches the rocket ship's thrusters, it's up to Mars Rover Blaze to navigate Mars and get those thrusters back!

programme.title: Hiccupism / Silence please
programme.desc: Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen
programme.desc: Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Daddy Shack / Rocky-Bye
programme.desc: After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. // Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Swimming Solo
programme.desc: Mommy Shark demonstrates a power that blows Baby away, sending him on a journey to find the same superpower within: Self-soothing!

programme.title: Pups Save a Disappearing Flounder / Pups Save Little Grandpa and Mr. Alex
programme.desc: When Cap'n Turbot's ship disappears, the Paw Patrol must venture into the mysterious Adventure Bay Triangle to find the missing vessel. // When Alex and Mr. Porter swap roles, the pups must help track down the Mini-Patrol after they go missing.

programme.title: Pups Great Race
programme.desc: It's Race Day and the pups are about to race each other across the town to see who is the fastest.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Splash Park / The Crew Builds A Playroom
programme.desc: With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. // As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily, a squirrelly visitor causes construction complications.

programme.title: At the Beach
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go to the beach, and they do lots of things there including burying Daddy Pig in the sand. When it's time to go they almost leave without Daddy Pig as he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Grandpa Pig's Boat
programme.desc: Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Shopping
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Mr Fox's Shop
programme.desc: Peppa and George visit Mr Fox's Shop to buy Granny and Grandpa an anniversary present, but what will they choose?

programme.title: Shadows
programme.desc: Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: Kylie Kangeroo
programme.desc: Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.desc: Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds.

programme.title: The Little Axolotl / Bubble Trouble
programme.desc: Dora and Boots find an adorable baby axolotl. They have to bring him home, but he keeps wandering off. // The Big Red Chicken gets stuck in a giant floating bubble and is heading straight for a volcano! Dora has to do a mid-air rescue to save him.

programme.title: Double Dare You / Roy
programme.desc: On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians
programme.desc: Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Trouble at the Truck Wash
programme.desc: When an overeager Crusher causes the Truck Wash to explode out into Axle City, Blaze and friends will need your help using angles to recover the pieces and get the trucks clean again!

programme.title: Cattle Drive
programme.desc: When Blaze and Starla encounter a herd of cows wandering out in the desert, they must embark on a wild west adventure to bring them back to Starla's barn.

programme.title: Pups Rescue Thanksgiving / Pups Save a Windy Bay
programme.desc: The bouncy turkey from the Thanksgiving feast at City Hall has flown away with Humdinger and his kittens! // A super-strong wind has suddenly swept up all the surfers in the Adventure Bay Windsurfing Race.

programme.title: Pups Save a Frozen Camp-out / Pups Save the Fizzy Pickles
programme.desc: Alex and Mr. Porter are on a tropical Island camping trip when a freak snowstorm hits! // Mr. Porter is delivering his famous fizzy pickles to people around town when a bumpy road shakes up the deliveries and causes the pickle jars to POP.

programme.title: Pups Save the Salmon
programme.desc: The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Cafe / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Cafe Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure
programme.desc: Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Too Many Swipers / Bateo's Home Run
programme.desc: Dora and Boots help Swiper re-join with his duplicates and make it to Grandma's picnic. / Dora and Boots help Bateo the Bat get to the baseball game in time to play.

programme.title: Daddy's Favorite / The Goldie Standard
programme.desc: The Sharks compete in a gameshow to devide which of them is Daddy's favorite. // Goldie attempts to win over a fishy who isn't her biggest fan.

programme.title: Blizz's Big Bite / Friend of a Friend
programme.desc: Baby and William help Blizzard Wizard try new foods around Carnivore Cove. // Bait gets jealous of Switch's new friend.

programme.title: Emily Elephant
programme.desc: There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: George's Friend
programme.desc: George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: The Boat Pond
programme.desc: Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper. Rebecca's paper boat is so nice; everyone wants one.

programme.title: Mr Scarecrow
programme.desc: The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry, so Granny Pig gives the birdies a birdfeeder with their own seeds.

programme.title: The Time Capsule
programme.desc: Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: Recycling
programme.desc: Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: Daddy Pig's Office
programme.desc: Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig's office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit's job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat's job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig's job is complicated.

programme.title: Pirate Island
programme.desc: Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Dreams And Illusions / Dreaming Apprentices
programme.desc: While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about. // To dream makes you grow... But what can Barbidur, Barbalala, Barbotine and Barbidou possibly dream of?

programme.title: Ah! My Beautiful Castle / The Sand Is Running Away
programme.desc: During a bike ride, the Barbapapa family discovers an old medieval castle in ruins. // Barbapapa and Lolita were traveling in a balloon, but caught in a storm they ended up stranded on a deserted island.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road
programme.desc: The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel

programme.title: Hum-Patrol to the Rescue! / Pups Save Morning Mountain Yoga
programme.desc: When Adventure Bay holds a raffle, a pair of nest-building seagulls snatch the winning prize. // A rockslide leaves Goodway, Farmer Yumi and Garby stranded on the side of a mountain.

programme.title: Pups and the Power of Flowers / Pups Save the Alien Egg
programme.desc: Humdinger tries to swipe the florist's Easter decorations and winds up on a runaway wagon with Mayor Goodway. // Mysterious Alien Easter Eggs cause trouble in Adventure Bay, the Paw Patrol and their Alien Friend will team up to catch them.

programme.title: Child Of The Stars I / Child Of The Stars II
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Lolita spotted a flying saucer approaching their house. // The Barbapapa have taken off aboard Bababam in the hope of discovering the planet of Baby Big Feet.

programme.title: Going With The Flow / The Decoder
programme.desc: The Barbababies are bored, the rain is preventing them from playing outside. // Barbibul has created a clever decoder capable of translating the cries of animals.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Mini Golf Course/The Crew Builds A Butterfly Garden
programme.desc: When a family of bunnies hops onto the soccer field, Rubble & Crew use their skills to build a new sport... Bunny Ball! // After the pups discover a new kind of butterfly, it flutters away! Will a giant butterfly garden help bring it back?

programme.title: The Crew Builds Library Treasure Tunnels / The Crew Builds A Super Snack Dispenser
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew's favorite book series has new additions! But when there's no room for them in the library, the pups have to get creative.// The pups have a surprise just for Rubble... a snack dispenser! But will they finish it before Rubble finds out?

programme.title: Tongue Twisted Troll / Chompy and the Cloud Flower
programme.desc: Dora and Boots help Grumpy Old Troll untwist his tongue with Quickatoo's help. // Dora and Boots help Chompy find another Cloud Flower Seed after he accidentally eats Isa's.

programme.title: Renewable Energy Racers
programme.desc: Blaze and his friends have renewable energy engines! And when the Gas Guzzler steals everyone's gas, they'll have to use renewable energy to finish the race!

programme.title: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup
programme.desc: The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World
programme.desc: Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: The Rainy Day Round-Up / Deep Goo Sea
programme.desc: When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. // William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Old Shark Bride
programme.desc: Baby gets carried away when he helps Grandma and Grandpa plan their vow renewal ceremony.

programme.title: Pups Save the Elephant Spa / Pups Save an Underwater Otis
programme.desc: While trying to save Traveling Travis, Ryder and the pups stumble across the legendary Elephants Spa. // Uncle Otis believes he's found gold but when Sid the Pirate tries to jump on Otis's claim, Otis gets trapped in a sunken shipping container.

programme.title: Pups Take the Cake
programme.desc: Mr. Porter enters a cake competition and needs Ryder and the pups to help him. The race is on to get their cake baked and to the competition on time!

programme.title: The Crew Builds A School / The Crew Builds A Waterway
programme.desc: It's the first day of school in Builder Cove... if Rubble & Crew can finish the building in time! / The pups need a construction solution to save Farmer Zoe's crops and to keep Crunchy the beaver from taking all the water!

programme.title: The Traffic Jam
programme.desc: Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. On the way, Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig get caught in a very long traffic jam, so Grandpa Pig decides to bring the lunch to them.

programme.title: Rock Pools
programme.desc: Granny and Grandpa Pig take Peppa and George to a beach with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. They all have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil. Peppa rescues a little fish in her bucket and puts it back in the sea.

programme.title: Teddy's Day Out
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zoe Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When it's home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Captain Daddy Dog
programme.desc: Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: Grampy Rabbit's Dinosaur Park
programme.desc: To celebrate Freddy Fox's birthday, the children go on a trip to a Dinosaur Park. With Grampy Rabbit as their leader, they follow dinosaur footprints to find Freddy's birthday treat.

programme.title: Bedtime Story
programme.desc: Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

programme.title: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians
programme.desc: Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Zero Waste
programme.desc: When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Trouble at the Truck Wash
programme.desc: When an overeager Crusher causes the Truck Wash to explode out into Axle City, Blaze and friends will need your help using angles to recover the pieces and get the trucks clean again!

programme.title: Cattle Drive
programme.desc: When Blaze and Starla encounter a herd of cows wandering out in the desert, they must embark on a wild west adventure to bring them back to Starla's barn.

programme.title: Pups Rescue Thanksgiving / Pups Save a Windy Bay
programme.desc: The bouncy turkey from the Thanksgiving feast at City Hall has flown away with Humdinger and his kittens! // A super-strong wind has suddenly swept up all the surfers in the Adventure Bay Windsurfing Race.

programme.title: Pups Save a Frozen Camp-out / Pups Save the Fizzy Pickles
programme.desc: Alex and Mr. Porter are on a tropical Island camping trip when a freak snowstorm hits! // Mr. Porter is delivering his famous fizzy pickles to people around town when a bumpy road shakes up the deliveries and causes the pickle jars to POP.

programme.title: Pups Save the Salmon
programme.desc: The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Cafe / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Cafe Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure
programme.desc: Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Too Many Swipers / Bateo's Home Run
programme.desc: Dora and Boots help Swiper re-join with his duplicates and make it to Grandma's picnic. / Dora and Boots help Bateo the Bat get to the baseball game in time to play.

programme.title: Daddy's Favorite / The Goldie Standard
programme.desc: The Sharks compete in a gameshow to devide which of them is Daddy's favorite. // Goldie attempts to win over a fishy who isn't her biggest fan.

programme.title: Blizz's Big Bite / Friend of a Friend
programme.desc: Baby and William help Blizzard Wizard try new foods around Carnivore Cove. // Bait gets jealous of Switch's new friend.

programme.title: Emily Elephant
programme.desc: There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: George's Friend
programme.desc: George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: The Boat Pond
programme.desc: Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper. Rebecca's paper boat is so nice; everyone wants one.

programme.title: Mr Scarecrow
programme.desc: The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry, so Granny Pig gives the birdies a birdfeeder with their own seeds.

programme.title: The Time Capsule
programme.desc: Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: Recycling
programme.desc: Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: Daddy Pig's Office
programme.desc: Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig's office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit's job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat's job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig's job is complicated.

programme.title: Pirate Island
programme.desc: Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Dreams And Illusions / Dreaming Apprentices
programme.desc: While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about. // To dream makes you grow... But what can Barbidur, Barbalala, Barbotine and Barbidou possibly dream of?

programme.title: Ah! My Beautiful Castle / The Sand Is Running Away
programme.desc: During a bike ride, the Barbapapa family discovers an old medieval castle in ruins. // Barbapapa and Lolita were traveling in a balloon, but caught in a storm they ended up stranded on a deserted island.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road
programme.desc: The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel
programme.desc: The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Hum-Patrol to the Rescue! / Pups Save Morning Mountain Yoga
programme.desc: When Adventure Bay holds a raffle, a pair of nest-building seagulls snatch the winning prize. // A rockslide leaves Goodway, Farmer Yumi and Garby stranded on the side of a mountain.

programme.title: Pups and the Power of Flowers / Pups Save the Alien Egg
programme.desc: Humdinger tries to swipe the florist's Easter decorations and winds up on a runaway wagon with Mayor Goodway. // Mysterious Alien Easter Eggs cause trouble in Adventure Bay, the Paw Patrol and their Alien Friend will team up to catch them.

programme.title: Child Of The Stars I / Child Of The Stars II
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Lolita spotted a flying saucer approaching their house. // The Barbapapa have taken off aboard Bababam in the hope of discovering the planet of Baby Big Feet.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26
programme.desc: Burnley are winless in their last 19 league visits to Manchester City (D6 L13) since a 5-2 win in March 1963. The Clarets have lost each of their last seven Premier League games at the Etihad Stadium.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26
programme.desc: In all competitions, Chelsea have won nine and lost just one of their 12 previous home games against Brighton and Hove Albion (D2), winning their last three in a row since a 1-2 reverse in April 2023.

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25 (Data Zone)
programme.desc: Newcastle have kept four clean sheets in their five Premier League games this season, conceding only in their 3-2 defeat to Liverpool. However, the Magpies have also failed to score in three of their five league games so far.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26
programme.desc: Leeds United have won all seven of their home league games against Bournemouth, scoring 18 goals in the process; it's the most they've faced a side on home soil with a 100% win rate in their league history.
